14077791Di2015UniqueSeparatorfloat fontSize = 52;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//some test image for this demoDi2015NewLineBitmap bmp = (Bitmap)Image.FromFile(s"test.jpg");Di2015NewLineGraphics g = Graphics.FromImage(bmp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//this will center align our text at the bottom of the imageDi2015NewLineStringFormat sf = new StringFormat();Di2015NewLinesf.Alignment = StringAlignment.Center;Di2015NewLinesf.LineAlignment = StringAlignment.Far;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//define a font to use.Di2015NewLineFont f = new Font("Impact", fontSize, FontStyle.Bold, GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//pen for outline - set width parameterDi2015NewLinePen p = new Pen(ColorTranslator.FromHtml("#77090C"), 8);Di2015NewLinep.LineJoin = LineJoin.Round; //prevent "spikes" at the pathDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//this makes the gradient repeat for each text lineDi2015NewLineRectangle fr = new Rectangle(0, bmp.Height - f.Height, bmp.Width, f.Height);Di2015NewLineLinearGradientBrush b = new LinearGradientBrush(fr,  Di2015NewLine                                                ColorTranslator.FromHtml("#FF6493"),Di2015NewLine                                                ColorTranslator.FromHtml("#D00F14"),Di2015NewLine                                                90);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//this will be the rectangle used to draw and auto-wrap the text.Di2015NewLine//basically = image sizeDi2015NewLineRectangle r = new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineGraphicsPath gp = new GraphicsPath();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//look mom! no pre-wrapping!Di2015NewLinegp.AddString("Demo for Stack Overflow", Di2015NewLine             f.FontFamily, (int)f.Style, fontSize, r, sf);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//these affect lines such as those in paths. 14079608Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Time : IEquatable<Time>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public String Hour;Di2015NewLine    public String Minute;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Time()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Hour = "00";Di2015NewLine        Minute = "00";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Time(String hour, String minute)Di2015NewLine        : this()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Hour = hour;Di2015NewLine        this.Minute = minute;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return int.Parse(Hour) * 60 + int.Parse(Minute);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var time = obj as Time;Di2015NewLine        return !ReferenceEquals(time, null) && Equals(time);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Equals(Time time)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.Equals(Hour, time.Hour, StringComparison.Ordinal) && string.Equals(Minute, time.Minute, StringComparison.Ordinal);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14080129Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static partial class MyExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //http://blogs.msdn.com/b/ericlippert/archive/2010/06/28/computing-a-cartesian-product-with-linq.aspxDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> CartesianProduct<T>(this IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> sequences)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // base case: Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> result = new[] { Enumerable.Empty<T>() };Di2015NewLine        foreach (var sequence in sequences)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var s = sequence; // don't close over the loop variable Di2015NewLine            // recursive case: use SelectMany to build the new product out of the old one Di2015NewLine            result =Di2015NewLine                from seq in resultDi2015NewLine                from item in sDi2015NewLine                select seq.Concat(new[] { item });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14085639Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach (var task in Model)
14085639Di2015UniqueSeparatorModel
14085639Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<Task>
14085639Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TaskDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Key { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar tasks = new List<Task>(); // create a list to populate with tasksDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (var connection = new SQLiteConnection(connString))    Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var command = new SQLiteCommand(sql, conn);Di2015NewLine    command.Parameters.Add("@userId", userId); // only do .ToString on userId if the column is a string.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    connection.Open();Di2015NewLine    using (var reader = cmd.ExecuteReader()) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (reader.Read()) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var task = new Task();Di2015NewLine            task.Id = (int)reader["id"]; // the name of the column in the reader will match the column in the Tasks table.Di2015NewLine            task.Name = (string)reader["name"];Di2015NewLine            task.Key = (string)reader["key"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tasks.Add(task);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereturn tasks;Di2015NewLine

14087089Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ToMyString(this TimeSpan ts)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (ts < TimeSpan.Zero)Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var parts = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine  AddPart(parts, ts.Days, "Day");Di2015NewLine  AddPart(parts, ts.Hours, "Hour");Di2015NewLine  AddPart(parts, ts.Minutes, "Minute");Di2015NewLine  AddPart(parts, ts.Seconds, "Second");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (parts.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine    return "0";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return string.Join(" ", parts);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void AddPart(List<string> parts, int number, string name)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (number == 1)Di2015NewLine    parts.Add("1 " + name);Di2015NewLine  else if (number > 1)Di2015NewLine    parts.Add(string.Format("{0} {1}s", number, name));        Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14087099Di2015UniqueSeparatorAddCascadeDeleteReference
14087099Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void AddCascadeDeleteReference(Di2015NewLine  this IAdvancedDocumentSessionOperations session,Di2015NewLine  object entity, params string[] documentKeys)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var metadata = session.GetMetadataFor(entity);Di2015NewLine    if (metadata == null)Di2015NewLine      throw new InvalidOperationException(Di2015NewLine        "The entity must be tracked in the session before calling this method.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (documentKeys.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine      throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine        "At least one document key must be specified.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const string metadataKey = "Raven-Cascade-Delete-Documents";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    RavenJToken token;Di2015NewLine    if (!metadata.TryGetValue(metadataKey, out token))Di2015NewLine        token = new RavenJArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var list = (RavenJArray) token;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var documentKey in documentKeys.Where(key => !list.Contains(key)))Di2015NewLine        list.Add(documentKey);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    metadata[metadataKey] = list;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14089567Di2015UniqueSeparatorPerRequest - The default operation.  A new instance will be created for each request.Di2015NewLineSingleton - A single instance will be shared across all requestsDi2015NewLineThreadLocal - A single instance will be created for each requesting thread.  Caches the instances with ThreadLocalStorage.Di2015NewLineHttpContext - A single instance will be created for each HttpContext.  Caches the instances in the HttpContext.Items collection.Di2015NewLineHttpSession - A single instance will be created for each HttpSession.  Caches the instances in the HttpContext.Session collection.  Use with caution.Di2015NewLineHybrid - Uses HttpContext storage if it exists, otherwise uses ThreadLocal storage.Di2015NewLine

14092896Di2015UniqueSeparatorPadLines
14092896Di2015UniqueSeparatorBuffer.BlockCopy
14092896Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic byte[] PadLines(byte[] bytes, int rows, int columns)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //The old and new offsets could be passed through parameters,Di2015NewLine    //but I hardcoded them here as a sample.Di2015NewLine    var currentStride = columns*3;Di2015NewLine    var newStride = columns*4;Di2015NewLine    var newBytes = new byte[newStride*rows];Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < rows; i++)Di2015NewLine        Buffer.BlockCopy(bytes, currentStride*i, newBytes, newStride * i, currentStride);Di2015NewLine    return newBytes;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14096011Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Hash8096Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class MainClassDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static byte [] H8096(byte [] x) {Di2015NewLine            byte [] Result = new byte[8096 / 8];Di2015NewLine            byte [] Xplus1 = new byte[x.Length + 1];Di2015NewLine            x.CopyTo(Xplus1, 1);Di2015NewLine            int ResultOffset = 0;Di2015NewLine            int AmountLeft = Result.Length;Di2015NewLine            for (int i=0; i<64; i++) {Di2015NewLine                // do MD5(i || x)Di2015NewLine                var md5 = MD5.Create();Di2015NewLine                Xplus1[0] = (byte) i;Di2015NewLine                var hash = md5.ComputeHash(Xplus1);Di2015NewLine                int NumToCopy = Math.Min(hash.Length, AmountLeft);Di2015NewLine                Array.Copy(hash, 0, Result, ResultOffset,NumToCopy);Di2015NewLine                ResultOffset += NumToCopy;Di2015NewLine                AmountLeft -= NumToCopy;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return Result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Main (string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte [] x = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes("Hello World!");Di2015NewLine            byte [] MonsterHash = H8096(x);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine ("Monster hash in hex follows:");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(BitConverter.ToString(MonsterHash));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14098942Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate async Task<string> post(string url, string postdata)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var request = WebRequest.Create(new Uri(url)) as HttpWebRequest;Di2015NewLine        request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] data = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(postdata);Di2015NewLine        request.ContentLength = data.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var requestStream = await Task<Stream>.Factory.FromAsync(request.BeginGetRequestStream, request.EndGetRequestStream, request))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            await requestStream.WriteAsync(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WebResponse responseObject = await Task<WebResponse>.Factory.FromAsync(request.BeginGetResponse, request.EndGetResponse, request);Di2015NewLine        var responseStream = responseObject.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine        var sr = new StreamReader(responseStream);Di2015NewLine        string received = await sr.ReadToEndAsync();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return received;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14099641Di2015UniqueSeparator  Stream stream = (Stream)openDialog.File.OpenRead();Di2015NewLine                    byte[] bytes = new byte[stream.Length];Di2015NewLine                    stream.Read(bytes, 0, (int)stream.Length);Di2015NewLine                    BitmapImage bmi = new BitmapImage();Di2015NewLine                    using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream(bytes))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        bmi.SetSource(ms);Di2015NewLine                        newRow.Thumbnail = bmi;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine
14099641Di2015UniqueSeparator string filePath = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings.Get("ImageUploadPath");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                          if (!Directory.Exists(filePath))Di2015NewLine                          {Di2015NewLine                              Directory.CreateDirectory(filePath);Di2015NewLine                          }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                          filePath = filePath + "\\\\" + picture.FileName + "." + picture.FileType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                          if (picture.FileName != string.Empty)Di2015NewLine                          {Di2015NewLine                              fileStream = File.Open(filePath, FileMode.Create);Di2015NewLine                              writer = new BinaryWriter(fileStream);Di2015NewLine                              writer.Write(picture.FileStream);Di2015NewLine                          }Di2015NewLine
14099717Di2015UniqueSeparator    public string GetLogo()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string logo = "";Di2015NewLine        if (!File.Exists(@"C:\\bitmap.bmp"))Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine         BitmapData data = GetBitmapData(@"C:\\bitmap.bmp");Di2015NewLine         BitArray dots = data.Dots;Di2015NewLine         byte[] width = BitConverter.GetBytes(data.Width);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         int offset = 0;Di2015NewLine         MemoryStream stream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine         BinaryWriter bw = new BinaryWriter(stream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         bw.Write((char)0x1B);Di2015NewLine         bw.Write('@');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         bw.Write((char)0x1B);Di2015NewLine         bw.Write('3');Di2015NewLine         bw.Write((byte)24);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         while (offset < data.Height)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine             bw.Write((char)0x1B);Di2015NewLine             bw.Write('*');         // bit-image modeDi2015NewLine             bw.Write((byte)33);    // 24-dot double-densityDi2015NewLine             bw.Write(width[0]);  // width low byteDi2015NewLine             bw.Write(width[1]);  // width high byteDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine             for (int x = 0; x < data.Width; ++x)Di2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLine                 for (int k = 0; k < 3; ++k)Di2015NewLine                 {Di2015NewLine                     byte slice = 0;Di2015NewLine                     for (int b = 0; b < 8; ++b)Di2015NewLine                     {Di2015NewLine                         int y = (((offset / 8) + k) * 8) + b;Di2015NewLine                         // Calculate the location of the pixel we want in the bit array.Di2015NewLine                         // It'll be at (y * width) + x.Di2015NewLine                         int i = (y * data.Width) + x;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                         // If the image is shorter than 24 dots, pad with zero.Di2015NewLine                         bool v = false;Di2015NewLine                         if (i < dots.Length)Di2015NewLine                         {Di2015NewLine                             v = dots[i];Di2015NewLine                         }Di2015NewLine                         slice |= (byte)((v ? 1 : 0) << (7 - b));Di2015NewLine                     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                     bw.Write(slice);Di2015NewLine                 }Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine             offset += 24;Di2015NewLine             bw.Write((char)0x0A);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         // Restore the line spacing to the default of 30 dots.Di2015NewLine         bw.Write((char)0x1B);Di2015NewLine         bw.Write('3');Di2015NewLine         bw.Write((byte)30);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         bw.Flush();Di2015NewLine         byte[] bytes = stream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine         return logo + Encoding.Default.GetString(bytes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BitmapData GetBitmapData(string bmpFileName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var bitmap = (Bitmap)Bitmap.FromFile(bmpFileName))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var threshold = 127;Di2015NewLine            var index = 0;Di2015NewLine            double multiplier = 570; // this depends on your printer model. for Beiyang you should use 1000Di2015NewLine            double scale = (double)(multiplier/(double)bitmap.Width);Di2015NewLine            int xheight = (int)(bitmap.Height * scale);Di2015NewLine            int xwidth = (int)(bitmap.Width * scale);Di2015NewLine            var dimensions = xwidth * xheight;Di2015NewLine            var dots = new BitArray(dimensions);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (var y = 0; y < xheight; y++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (var x = 0; x < xwidth; x++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var _x = (int)(x / scale);Di2015NewLine                    var _y = (int)(y / scale);Di2015NewLine                    var color = bitmap.GetPixel(_x, _y);Di2015NewLine                    var luminance = (int)(color.R * 0.3 + color.G * 0.59 + color.B * 0.11);Di2015NewLine                    dots[index] = (luminance < threshold);Di2015NewLine                    index++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new BitmapData()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Dots = dots,Di2015NewLine                Height = (int)(bitmap.Height*scale),Di2015NewLine                Width = (int)(bitmap.Width*scale)Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class BitmapDataDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public BitArray DotsDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get;Di2015NewLine            set;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int HeightDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get;Di2015NewLine            set;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int WidthDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get;Di2015NewLine            set;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14100214Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Bitmap GetSprite(bool anim, int tsIndex, int tileIdx) {Di2015NewLine    string prefix;Di2015NewLine    System.Drawing.Rectangle cloneRect;Di2015NewLine    SpriteSet set;Di2015NewLine    if (anim) {Di2015NewLine        prefix = "A";Di2015NewLine        set = BaseObjects.A_AnimSpriteSets[tsIndex];Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine        prefix = "S";Di2015NewLine        set = BaseObjects.A_StaticSpriteSets[tsIndex];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    cloneRect = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(set.StaticRecs[tileIdx].X, set.StaticRecs[tileIdx].Y, set.RecWidth, set.RecHeight);Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        using (Bitmap b = new Bitmap(prefix + tsIndex.ToString() + ".png")) {Di2015NewLine            return b.Clone(cloneRect, b.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } catch (Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("Error: " + ex.Message + "\\n\\nCause: " + "SpriteSet not yet loaded.");Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14100254Di2015UniqueSeparatorMonitor.Exit
14100254Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Exit(object key) {Di2015NewLine    if(!IsActive) {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(LockDictionary.ContainsKey(key)) {Di2015NewLine        var syncObject=LockDictionary[key];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(Monitor.TryEnter(syncObject.SyncObject, 0)) {Di2015NewLine            SetLockExit(syncObject);Di2015NewLine            Monitor.Exit(syncObject.SyncObject);Di2015NewLine            Monitor.Exit(syncObject.SyncObject);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14100254Di2015UniqueSeparatortry {Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        if(!Monitor.TryEnter(obj, 2000)) {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("can not lock");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finally {Di2015NewLine        if(Monitor.TryEnter(obj, 0)) {Di2015NewLine            Monitor.Exit(obj);Di2015NewLine            Monitor.Exit(obj);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinecatch {Di2015NewLine    //LogDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14100254Di2015UniqueSeparatorMonitor.Exit

14103458Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic async Task AsyncMethod()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    await Task.Run(() =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception();Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic async Task<ActionResult> Index()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var t1 = Task.Run(() => { throw new Exception(); });Di2015NewLine    var t2 = Task.Run(() => { throw new Exception();});Di2015NewLine    var t3 = Task.Run(async () => { await AsyncMethod(); });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    try Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        await Task.WhenAll(t1, t2, t3);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ex1 = t1.Exception.InnerException;Di2015NewLine        var ex2 = t2.Exception.InnerException;Di2015NewLine        var ex3 = t3.Exception.InnerException;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return View();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14103474Di2015UniqueSeparator// Use LoginCompletedEventArgs, or whatever type you need out of the .loginCompleted eventDi2015NewLine// This is an extension method, and needs to be placed in a static class.Di2015NewLinepublic static Task<LoginCompletedEventArgs> LoginAsyncTask(this YChatWebService.WebServiceControllerPortTypeClient client, string userName, string password) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    var tcs = CreateSource<LoginCompletedEventArgs>(null); Di2015NewLine    client.loginCompleted += (sender, e) => TransferCompletion(tcs, e, () => e, null); Di2015NewLine    client.loginAsync(userName, password);Di2015NewLine    return tcs.Task; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static TaskCompletionSource<T> CreateSource<T>(object state) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    return new TaskCompletionSource<T>( Di2015NewLine        state, TaskCreationOptions.None); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void TransferCompletion<T>( Di2015NewLine    TaskCompletionSource<T> tcs, AsyncCompletedEventArgs e, Di2015NewLine    Func<T> getResult, Action unregisterHandler) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    if (e.UserState == tcs) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        if (e.Cancelled) tcs.TrySetCanceled(); Di2015NewLine        else if (e.Error != null) tcs.TrySetException(e.Error); Di2015NewLine        else tcs.TrySetResult(getResult()); Di2015NewLine        if (unregisterHandler != null) unregisterHandler();Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14110071Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst string k_base36_digits = "0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";Di2015NewLinevar base36_no_zeros = new RadixEncoding(k_base36_digits, EndianFormat.Little, false);Di2015NewLine
14110071Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst string k_input = "A test 1234";Di2015NewLinebyte[] input_bytes = System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(k_input);Di2015NewLinestring encoded_string = base36_no_zeros.Encode(input_bytes);Di2015NewLinebyte[] decoded_bytes = base36_no_zeros.Decode(encoded_string);Di2015NewLine
14110071Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Numerics;Di2015NewLineusing Contract = System.Diagnostics.Contracts.Contract;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic enum EndianFormatDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Least Significant Bit order (lsb)</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>Right-to-Left</remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// <see cref="BitConverter.IsLittleEndian"/>Di2015NewLine    Little,Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Most Significant Bit order (msb)</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>Left-to-Right</remarks>Di2015NewLine    Big,Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Encodes/decodes bytes to/from a string</summary>Di2015NewLine/// <remarks>Di2015NewLine/// Encoded string is always in big-endian orderingDi2015NewLine/// Di2015NewLine/// <p>Encode and Decode take a <b>includeProceedingZeros</b> parameter which acts as a work-aroundDi2015NewLine/// for an edge case with our BigInteger implementation.Di2015NewLine/// MSDN says BigInteger byte arrays are in LSB->MSB ordering. So a byte buffer with zeros at the Di2015NewLine/// end will have those zeros ignored in the resulting encoded radix string.Di2015NewLine/// If such a loss in precision absolutely cannot occur pass true to <b>includeProceedingZeros</b>Di2015NewLine/// and for a tiny bit of extra processing it will handle the padding of zero digits (encoding)Di2015NewLine/// or bytes (decoding).</p>Di2015NewLine/// <p>Note: doing this for decoding <b>may</b> add an extra byte more than what was originally Di2015NewLine/// given to Encode.</p>Di2015NewLine/// </remarks>Di2015NewLine// Based on the answers from http://codereview.stackexchange.com/questions/14084/base-36-encoding-of-a-byte-array/Di2015NewLinepublic class RadixEncodingDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int kByteBitCount = 8;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    readonly string kDigits;Di2015NewLine    readonly double kBitsPerDigit;Di2015NewLine    readonly BigInteger kRadixBig;Di2015NewLine    readonly EndianFormat kEndian;Di2015NewLine    readonly bool kIncludeProceedingZeros;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Numerial base of this encoding</summary>Di2015NewLine    public int Radix { get { return kDigits.Length; } }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Endian ordering of bytes input to Encode and output by Decode</summary>Di2015NewLine    public EndianFormat Endian { get { return kEndian; } }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>True if we want ending zero bytes to be encoded</summary>Di2015NewLine    public bool IncludeProceedingZeros { get { return kIncludeProceedingZeros; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("Base-{0} {1}", Radix.ToString(), kDigits);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Create a radix encoder using the given characters as the digits in the radix</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="digits">Digits to use for the radix-encoded string</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="bytesEndian">Endian ordering of bytes input to Encode and output by Decode</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="includeProceedingZeros">True if we want ending zero bytes to be encoded</param>Di2015NewLine    public RadixEncoding(string digits,Di2015NewLine        EndianFormat bytesEndian = EndianFormat.Little, bool includeProceedingZeros = false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Contract.Requires<ArgumentNullException>(digits != null);Di2015NewLine        int radix = digits.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        kDigits = digits;Di2015NewLine        kBitsPerDigit = System.Math.Log(radix, 2);Di2015NewLine        kRadixBig = new BigInteger(radix);Di2015NewLine        kEndian = bytesEndian;Di2015NewLine        kIncludeProceedingZeros = includeProceedingZeros;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Number of characters needed for encoding the specified number of bytesDi2015NewLine    int EncodingCharsCount(int bytesLength)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (int)Math.Ceiling((bytesLength * kByteBitCount) / kBitsPerDigit);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Number of bytes needed to decoding the specified number of charactersDi2015NewLine    int DecodingBytesCount(int charsCount)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (int)Math.Ceiling((charsCount * kBitsPerDigit) / kByteBitCount);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Encode a byte array into a radix-encoded string</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="bytes">byte array to encode</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The bytes in encoded into a radix-encoded string</returns>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>If <paramref name="bytes"/> is zero length, returns an empty string</remarks>Di2015NewLine    public string Encode(byte[] bytes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Contract.Requires<ArgumentNullException>(bytes != null);Di2015NewLine        Contract.Ensures(Contract.Result<string>() != null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Don't really have to do this, our code will build this result (empty string),Di2015NewLine        // but why not catch the condition before doing work?Di2015NewLine        if (bytes.Length == 0) return string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // if the array ends with zeros, having the capacity set to this will help us know how muchDi2015NewLine        // 'padding' we will need to addDi2015NewLine        int result_length = EncodingCharsCount(bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine        // List<> has a(n in-place) Reverse method. StringBuilder doesn't. That's why.Di2015NewLine        var result = new List<char>(result_length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // HACK: BigInteger uses the last byte as the 'sign' byte. If that byte's MSB is set, Di2015NewLine        // we need to pad the input with an extra 0 (ie, make it positive)Di2015NewLine        if ( (bytes[bytes.Length-1] & 0x80) == 0x80 )Di2015NewLine            Array.Resize(ref bytes, bytes.Length+1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var dividend = new BigInteger(bytes);Di2015NewLine        // IsZero's computation is less complex than evaluating "dividend > 0"Di2015NewLine        // which invokes BigInteger.CompareTo(BigInteger)Di2015NewLine        while (!dividend.IsZero)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BigInteger remainder;Di2015NewLine            dividend = BigInteger.DivRem(dividend, kRadixBig, out remainder);Di2015NewLine            int digit_index = System.Math.Abs((int)remainder);Di2015NewLine            result.Add(kDigits[digit_index]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (kIncludeProceedingZeros)Di2015NewLine            for (int x = result.Count; x < result.Capacity; x++)Di2015NewLine                result.Add(kDigits[0]); // pad with the character that represents 'zero'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // orientate the characters in big-endian orderingDi2015NewLine        if (kEndian == EndianFormat.Little)Di2015NewLine            result.Reverse();Di2015NewLine        // If we didn't end up adding padding, ToArray will end up returning a TrimExcess'd array, Di2015NewLine        // so nothing wastedDi2015NewLine        return new string(result.ToArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void DecodeImplPadResult(ref byte[] result, int padCount)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (padCount > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int new_length = result.Length + DecodingBytesCount(padCount);Di2015NewLine            Array.Resize(ref result, new_length); // new bytes will be zero, just the way we want itDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #region Decode (Little Endian)Di2015NewLine    byte[] DecodeImpl(string chars, int startIndex = 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var bi = new BigInteger();Di2015NewLine        for (int x = startIndex; x < chars.Length; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int i = kDigits.IndexOf(chars[x]);Di2015NewLine            if (i < 0) return null; // invalid characterDi2015NewLine            bi *= kRadixBig;Di2015NewLine            bi += i;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return bi.ToByteArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    byte[] DecodeImplWithPadding(string chars)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int pad_count = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < chars.Length; x++, pad_count++)Di2015NewLine            if (chars[x] != kDigits[0]) break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var result = DecodeImpl(chars, pad_count);Di2015NewLine        DecodeImplPadResult(ref result, pad_count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine    #region Decode (Big Endian)Di2015NewLine    byte[] DecodeImplReversed(string chars, int startIndex = 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var bi = new BigInteger();Di2015NewLine        for (int x = (chars.Length-1)-startIndex; x >= 0; x--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int i = kDigits.IndexOf(chars[x]);Di2015NewLine            if (i < 0) return null; // invalid characterDi2015NewLine            bi *= kRadixBig;Di2015NewLine            bi += i;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return bi.ToByteArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    byte[] DecodeImplReversedWithPadding(string chars)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int pad_count = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int x = chars.Length - 1; x >= 0; x--, pad_count++)Di2015NewLine            if (chars[x] != kDigits[0]) break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var result = DecodeImplReversed(chars, pad_count);Di2015NewLine        DecodeImplPadResult(ref result, pad_count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Decode a radix-encoded string into a byte array</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="radixChars">radix string</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The decoded bytes, or null if an invalid character is encountered</returns>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// If <paramref name="radixChars"/> is an empty string, returns a zero length arrayDi2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    /// Using <paramref name="IncludeProceedingZeros"/> has the potential to return a buffer with anDi2015NewLine    /// additional zero byte that wasn't in the input. So a 4 byte buffer was encoded, this could end upDi2015NewLine    /// returning a 5 byte buffer, with the extra byte being null.Di2015NewLine    /// </remarks>Di2015NewLine    public byte[] Decode(string radixChars)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Contract.Requires<ArgumentNullException>(radixChars != null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (kEndian == EndianFormat.Big)Di2015NewLine            return kIncludeProceedingZeros ? DecodeImplReversedWithPadding(radixChars) : DecodeImplReversed(radixChars);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return kIncludeProceedingZeros ? DecodeImplWithPadding(radixChars) : DecodeImpl(radixChars);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLine
14110071Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic bool ArraysCompareN<T>(T[] input, T[] output)Di2015NewLine    where T : IEquatable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (output.Length < input.Length) return false;Di2015NewLine    for (int x = 0; x < input.Length; x++)Di2015NewLine        if(!output[x].Equals(input[x])) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic bool RadixEncodingTest(RadixEncoding encoding, byte[] bytes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string encoded = encoding.Encode(bytes);Di2015NewLine    byte[] decoded = encoding.Decode(encoded);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ArraysCompareN(bytes, decoded);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine[TestMethod]Di2015NewLinepublic void TestRadixEncoding()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const string k_base36_digits = "0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";Di2015NewLine    var base36 = new RadixEncoding(k_base36_digits, EndianFormat.Little, true);Di2015NewLine    var base36_no_zeros = new RadixEncoding(k_base36_digits, EndianFormat.Little, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] ends_with_zero_neg = { 0xFF, 0xFF, 0x00, 0x00 };Di2015NewLine    byte[] ends_with_zero_pos = { 0xFF, 0x7F, 0x00, 0x00 };Di2015NewLine    byte[] text = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes("A test 1234");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Assert.IsTrue(RadixEncodingTest(base36, ends_with_zero_neg));Di2015NewLine    Assert.IsTrue(RadixEncodingTest(base36, ends_with_zero_pos));Di2015NewLine    Assert.IsTrue(RadixEncodingTest(base36_no_zeros, text));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14113595Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DataAccessDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Hydrates the collection of the type passes in.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T"></typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sql">The SQL.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="connection">The connection.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>List{``0}.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public List<T> List<T>(string sql, string connection) where T: new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<T> items = new List<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (SqlCommand command = new SqlCommand(sql, new SqlConnection(connection)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] columns = GetColumnsNames<T>();Di2015NewLine            var reader = command.ExecuteReader(CommandBehavior.CloseConnection);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                T item = new T();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (var column in columns)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    object val = reader.GetValue(reader.GetOrdinal(column));Di2015NewLine                    SetValue(item, val, column);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                items.Add(item);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            command.Connection.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return items;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Sets the value.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T"></typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="item">The item.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="value">The value.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="column">The column.</param>Di2015NewLine    private void SetValue<T>(T item, object value, string column)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var property = item.GetType().GetProperty(column);Di2015NewLine        property.SetValue(item, value, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the columns names.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam T();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (from i in item.GetType().GetProperties()Di2015NewLine                select i.Name).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14114781Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine///   Replaces invalid characters in a file name by " ". Apply only to the filename.extDi2015NewLine///   part, not to the path part.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="fileName">A file name (not containing the path part) possiblyDi2015NewLine///   containing invalid characters.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A valid file name.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static string GetValidFileName(string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string invalidChars = Regex.Escape(new string(Path.GetInvalidFileNameChars()));Di2015NewLine    string s = Regex.Replace(fileName, "[" + invalidChars + "]", " ");Di2015NewLine    s = Regex.Replace(s, @"\\s\\s+", " "); // Replace multiple spaces by one space.Di2015NewLine    string fil = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(s).Trim().Trim('.');Di2015NewLine    string ext = Path.GetExtension(s).Trim().Trim('.');Di2015NewLine    if (ext != "") {Di2015NewLine        fil += "." + ext;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    fil = fil.Replace(" .", ".");Di2015NewLine    return fil == "." ? "" : fil;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14115782Di2015UniqueSeparator// Our anonymous type sequenceDi2015NewLinevar anonymousEnumerable = EnumerableDi2015NewLine        .Range(0, 10)Di2015NewLine        .Select(i => new { ID = i, Text = i.ToString() });Di2015NewLinevar enumerableCount = anonymousEnumerable.Count();Di2015NewLinevar anonymousType = anonymousEnumerable.First().GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Option #1 - declare it as dynamic, i.e., anything goesDi2015NewLinedynamic[] asDynamicArray = new dynamic[enumerableCount];Di2015NewLineforeach(var tuple in anonymousEnumerable.Select((item, i) => Tuple.Create(i, item)))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    asDynamicArray[tuple.Item1] = tuple.Item2;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Let's go the IEnumerable routeDi2015NewLineforeach (var asDynamic in asDynamicArray)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("ID:{0} Text:{1}", asDynamic.ID, asDynamic.Text);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Lowest common denominator: *everything* is an objectDi2015NewLineobject[] asObjectArray = new object[enumerableCount];Di2015NewLineforeach(var tuple in anonymousEnumerable.Select((item, i) => Tuple.Create(i, item)))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    asObjectArray[tuple.Item1] = tuple.Item2;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Let's iterate with a for loop - BUT, it's now "untyped", so things get nastyDi2015NewLinevar idGetterMethod = anonymousType.GetMethod("get_ID");Di2015NewLinevar textGetterMethod = anonymousType.GetMethod("get_Text");Di2015NewLinefor(int i=0;i < asObjectArray.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var asObject = asObjectArray[i];Di2015NewLine    var id = (int)idGetterMethod.Invoke(asObject, null);Di2015NewLine    var text = (string)textGetterMethod.Invoke(asObject, null);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("ID:{0} Text:{1}", id, text);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This is cheating :)Di2015NewLinevar letTheCompilerDecide = anonymousEnumerable.ToArray();Di2015NewLineforeach (var item in letTheCompilerDecide)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("ID:{0} Text:{1}", item.ID, item.Text);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Use reflection to "make" an array of the anonymous typeDi2015NewLinevar anonymousArrayType = anonymousType.MakeArrayType();Di2015NewLinevar reflectIt = Activator.CreateInstance(Di2015NewLine          anonymousArrayType, Di2015NewLine          enumerableCount) as Array;    Di2015NewLineArray.Copy(anonymousEnumerable.ToArray(), reflectIt, enumerableCount);  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// We're kind of in the same boat as the object array here, since weDi2015NewLine// don't really know what the underlying item type isDi2015NewLinefor(int i=0;i < reflectIt.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var asObject = reflectIt.GetValue(i);Di2015NewLine    var id = (int)idGetterMethod.Invoke(asObject, null);Di2015NewLine    var text = (string)textGetterMethod.Invoke(asObject, null);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("ID:{0} Text:{1}", id, text);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14115994Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction minutesToText(val) {Di2015NewLine    var hours = parseInt(val / 60,10),Di2015NewLine        minutes, hourText = '',Di2015NewLine        minuteText = '';Di2015NewLine    if(hours >= 1) {Di2015NewLine        minutes = val - (hours * 60);Di2015NewLine        hourText = hours + ' hour' + pluralize(hours)+', 'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine        minutes = val;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    minuteText = minutes+ ' minute' + pluralize(minutes);Di2015NewLine    return hourText + minuteText;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction pluralize(num) {Di2015NewLine    return num == 1 ? '' : 's'Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14116234Di2015UniqueSeparator\\[pre=(?<lang>[a-z]+)\\](?<code>.*?)\\[/pre\\]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineMatch the character “[? literally «\\[»Di2015NewLineMatch the characters “pre=? literally «pre=»Di2015NewLineMatch the regular expression below and capture its match into backreference with name     “lang? «(?<lang>[a-z]+)»Di2015NewLine   Match a single character in the range between “a? and “z? «[a-z]+»Di2015NewLine      Between one and unlimited times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed     (greedy) «+»Di2015NewLineMatch the character “]? literally «\\]»Di2015NewLineMatch the regular expression below and capture its match into backreference with name     “code? «(?<code>.*?)»Di2015NewLine   Match any single character that is not a line break character «.*?»Di2015NewLine      Between zero and unlimited times, as few times as possible, expanding as needed (lazy) «*?»Di2015NewLineMatch the character “[? literally «\\[»Di2015NewLineMatch the characters “/pre? literally «/pre»Di2015NewLineMatch the character “]? literally «\\]»Di2015NewLine

14122947Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<ConstructorInfo> GetConstructors(Type type, Type baseParameterType)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  List<ConstructorInfo> result = new List<ConstructorInfo>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  foreach (ConstructorInfo ci in type.GetConstructors())Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var parameters = ci.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine    if (parameters.Length != 1)Di2015NewLine      continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ParameterInfo pi = parameters.First();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!baseParameterType.IsAssignableFrom(pi.ParameterType))Di2015NewLine      continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    result.Add(ci);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14123473Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass RotatingPictureBox : PictureBoxDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public double Angle { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public double Speed { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public double Distance { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void RotateStep()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var oldX = Math.Cos(Angle)*Distance;Di2015NewLine        var oldY = Math.Sin(Angle)*Distance;Di2015NewLine        Angle += Speed;Di2015NewLine        var x = Math.Cos(Angle)*Distance - oldX;Di2015NewLine        var y = Math.Sin(Angle)*Distance - oldY;Di2015NewLine        Location += new Size((int) x, (int) y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14123947Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void ProcessNextPage() {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   if(stack.Count == 0) //INFINIT LOOP BREAK CONDITIONDi2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   var pageToProcess = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine   Task.StartNew(t=> {Di2015NewLine       /*DO SOMETHING WITH pageToProcess*/Di2015NewLine   }).ContinueWith(a=>processNextPage()); //ON COMPLETE, CALL MYSELF (RECURSION)Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14123991Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PageableGridView : GridView, IPageableItemContainerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     public PageableGridView() : base()Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine          PagerSettings.Visible = false;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     public event EventHandler<PageEventArgs> TotalRowCountAvailable;Di2015NewLine     public int MaximumRowsDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine          get{ return this.PageSize; }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     public int StartRowIndexDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine          get{ return (this.PageSize * this.PageIndex); }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     protected virtual void OnTotalRowCountAvailable(PageEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine          if (TotalRowCountAvailable != null)Di2015NewLine                TotalRowCountAvailable(this, e);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     protected virtual void SetPageProperties(int startRowIndex, int maximumRows, bool dataBind) { }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14123991Di2015UniqueSeparator//Gets row count from SqlDataSource and the like...Di2015NewLineprivate int _GetTotalRowsFromDataSourceObject(IEnumerable dataSource)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DataSourceView view = this.GetData(); if (AllowPaging && view.CanPage && view.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount)Di2015NewLine        return base.SelectArguments.TotalRowCount;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        return (PageIndex * PageSize) + _GetSourceCount(dataSource);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine//Gets the row count from a manually bound source or from a source in viewstateDi2015NewLineprivate int _GetSourceCount(IEnumerable dataSource)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ICollection source = dataSource as ICollection;Di2015NewLine    return source != null ?Di2015NewLine         source.Count :Di2015NewLine         (from x in dataSource.OfType<object>() select 1).Sum();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14123991Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected override int CreateChildControls(IEnumerable dataSource, bool dataBinding)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       int baseResult = base.CreateChildControls(dataSource, dataBinding);Di2015NewLine       if (dataSource != null)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           int dataSourceCount = (IsBoundUsingDataSourceID && dataBinding) ?Di2015NewLine               _GetTotalRowsFromDataSource(dataSource) :Di2015NewLine               _GetSourceCount(dataSource);Di2015NewLine           OnTotalRowCountAvailable(new PageEventArgs(StartRowIndex, MaximumRows, dataSourceCount));Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine       return baseResult;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine

14124417Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NewCVXml : IXmlSerializable {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public List<string> FieldFirst { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public List<string> FieldSecond { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public List<string> FieldThird { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void WriteXml (XmlWriter writer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Custom Serialization HereDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ReadXml (XmlReader reader)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Custom Deserialization HereDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public XmlSchema GetSchema()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return(null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14124459Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static double Calc(DateTime start, DateTime end, int startHour, int startMin, int endHour, int endMin)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (start > end)Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception();//or whatever you want to doDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //create timespans for night hoursDi2015NewLine    TimeSpan nightStart = new TimeSpan(startHour, startMin, 0);Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan nightEnd = new TimeSpan(endHour, endMin, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //check to see if any overlapping actually happensDi2015NewLine    if (start.Date == end.Date && start.TimeOfDay >= nightEnd && end.TimeOfDay <= nightStart)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //no overlapping occurs so return 0Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //check if same day as will process this differentlyDi2015NewLine    if (start.Date == end.Date)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (start.TimeOfDay > nightStart || end.TimeOfDay < nightEnd)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (end - start).TotalHours;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double total = 0;Di2015NewLine        if (start.TimeOfDay < nightEnd)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            total += (nightEnd - start.TimeOfDay).TotalHours;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if(end.TimeOfDay > nightStart)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            total += (end.TimeOfDay - nightStart).TotalHours;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return total;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else//spans multiple daysDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double total = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //add up first dayDi2015NewLine        if (start.TimeOfDay < nightEnd)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            total += (nightEnd - start.TimeOfDay).TotalHours;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (start.TimeOfDay < nightStart)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            total += ((new TimeSpan(24, 0, 0)) - nightStart).TotalHours;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            total += ((new TimeSpan(24, 0, 0)) - start.TimeOfDay).TotalHours;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //add up the last dayDi2015NewLine        if (end.TimeOfDay > nightStart)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            total += (end.TimeOfDay - nightStart).TotalHours;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (end.TimeOfDay > nightEnd)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            total += nightEnd.TotalHours;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            total += end.TimeOfDay.TotalHours;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //add up any full daysDi2015NewLine        int numberOfFullDays = (end - start).Days;Di2015NewLine        if (end.TimeOfDay > start.TimeOfDay)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            numberOfFullDays--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (numberOfFullDays > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double hoursInFullDay = ((new TimeSpan(24, 0, 0)) - nightStart).TotalHours + nightEnd.TotalHours;Di2015NewLine            total += hoursInFullDay * numberOfFullDays;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return total;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14124459Di2015UniqueSeparatordouble result = Calc(startDateTime, endDateTime, 20, 30, 6, 15);Di2015NewLine

14124959Di2015UniqueSeparatorHtml.BeginCollectionItem
14124959Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class HtmlPrefixScopeExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const string idsToReuseKey = "__htmlPrefixScopeExtensions_IdsToReuse_";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IDisposable BeginCollectionItem(this HtmlHelper html, string collectionName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var idsToReuse = GetIdsToReuse(html.ViewContext.HttpContext, collectionName);Di2015NewLine        string itemIndex = idsToReuse.Count > 0 ? idsToReuse.Dequeue() : Guid.NewGuid().ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // autocomplete="off" is needed to work around a very annoying Chrome behaviour whereby it reuses old values after the user clicks "Back", which causes the xyz.index and xyz[...] values to get out of sync.Di2015NewLine        html.ViewContext.Writer.WriteLine(string.Format("<input type=\\"hidden\\" name=\\"{0}.index\\" autocomplete=\\"off\\" value=\\"{1}\\" />", collectionName, html.Encode(itemIndex)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return BeginHtmlFieldPrefixScope(html, string.Format("{0}[{1}]", collectionName, itemIndex));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IDisposable BeginHtmlFieldPrefixScope(this HtmlHelper html, string htmlFieldPrefix)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new HtmlFieldPrefixScope(html.ViewData.TemplateInfo, htmlFieldPrefix);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Queue<string> GetIdsToReuse(HttpContextBase httpContext, string collectionName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // We need to use the same sequence of IDs following a server-side validation failure,  Di2015NewLine        // otherwise the framework won't render the validation error messages next to each item.Di2015NewLine        string key = idsToReuseKey + collectionName;Di2015NewLine        var queue = (Queue<string>)httpContext.Items[key];Di2015NewLine        if (queue == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            httpContext.Items[key] = queue = new Queue<string>();Di2015NewLine            var previouslyUsedIds = httpContext.Request[collectionName + ".index"];Di2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(previouslyUsedIds))Di2015NewLine                foreach (string previouslyUsedId in previouslyUsedIds.Split(','))Di2015NewLine                    queue.Enqueue(previouslyUsedId);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return queue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class HtmlFieldPrefixScope : IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly TemplateInfo templateInfo;Di2015NewLine        private readonly string previousHtmlFieldPrefix;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public HtmlFieldPrefixScope(TemplateInfo templateInfo, string htmlFieldPrefix)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.templateInfo = templateInfo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            previousHtmlFieldPrefix = templateInfo.HtmlFieldPrefix;Di2015NewLine            templateInfo.HtmlFieldPrefix = htmlFieldPrefix;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            templateInfo.HtmlFieldPrefix = previousHtmlFieldPrefix;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14128125Di2015UniqueSeparator    public override event NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler CollectionChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnCollectionChanged(NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Prevent infinite loop that could occur if handler changes the collectionDi2015NewLine        using (BlockReentrancy())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!m_fSuppressNotifications)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Get the current eventDi2015NewLine                var oCollectionChangedEvent = this.CollectionChanged;Di2015NewLine                if (oCollectionChangedEvent != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (EventHandler oHandler in oCollectionChangedEvent.GetInvocationList())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Execute the handlerDi2015NewLine                        oHandler(this, e);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14130479Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void WriteToDisk<T>(string fileName, T[] vector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var correctMethod = typeof(BinaryWriter).GetMethod("Write", new[] { typeof(T), });Di2015NewLine    if (correctMethod == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("No suitable overload found for type " + typeof(T), "T");Di2015NewLine    using (var stream = new FileStream(fileName, FileMode.Create))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var writer = new BinaryWriter(stream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           foreach(var v in vector)Di2015NewLine               correctMethod.Invoke(writer, new object[] { v, });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14130992Di2015UniqueSeparatorStartNew
14130992Di2015UniqueSeparator/* This is a benchmarking template I use in LINQPad when I want to do aDi2015NewLine * quick performance test. Just give it a couple of actions to test andDi2015NewLine * it will give you a pretty good idea of how long they take comparedDi2015NewLine * to one another. It's not perfect: You can expect a 3% error marginDi2015NewLine * under ideal circumstances. But if you're not going to improveDi2015NewLine * performance by more than 3%, you probably don't care anyway.*/Di2015NewLinevoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Enter setup code hereDi2015NewLine    var actions2 =Di2015NewLine    (from i in Enumerable.Range(1, 10000)Di2015NewLine    select (Action)(() => {})).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var awaitList = new Task[actions2.Length];Di2015NewLine    var actions = new[]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        new TimedAction("Task.Factory.StartNew", () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Enter code to test hereDi2015NewLine            int j = 0;Di2015NewLine            foreach(var action in actions2)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                awaitList[j++] = Task.Factory.StartNew(action);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Task.WaitAll(awaitList.ToArray());Di2015NewLine        }),Di2015NewLine        new TimedAction("Parallel.Invoke", () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Enter code to test hereDi2015NewLine            Parallel.Invoke(actions2);Di2015NewLine        }),Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    const int TimesToRun = 100; // Tweak this as necessaryDi2015NewLine    TimeActions(TimesToRun, actions);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#region timer helper methodsDi2015NewLine// Define other methods and classes hereDi2015NewLinepublic void TimeActions(int iterations, params TimedAction[] actions)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Stopwatch s = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine    int length = actions.Length;Di2015NewLine    var results = new ActionResult[actions.Length];Di2015NewLine    // Perform the actions in their initial order.Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var action = actions[i];Di2015NewLine        var result = results[i] = new ActionResult{Message = action.Message};Di2015NewLine        // Do a dry run to get things ramped up/cachedDi2015NewLine        result.DryRun1 = s.Time(action.Action, 10);Di2015NewLine        result.FullRun1 = s.Time(action.Action, iterations);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Perform the actions in reverse order.Di2015NewLine    for(int i = length - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var action = actions[i];Di2015NewLine        var result = results[i];Di2015NewLine        // Do a dry run to get things ramped up/cachedDi2015NewLine        result.DryRun2 = s.Time(action.Action, 10);Di2015NewLine        result.FullRun2 = s.Time(action.Action, iterations);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    results.Dump();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ActionResultDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Message {get;set;}Di2015NewLine    public double DryRun1 {get;set;}Di2015NewLine    public double DryRun2 {get;set;}Di2015NewLine    public double FullRun1 {get;set;}Di2015NewLine    public double FullRun2 {get;set;}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TimedActionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public TimedAction(string message, Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Message = message;Di2015NewLine        Action = action;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public string Message {get;private set;}Di2015NewLine    public Action Action {get;private set;}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class StopwatchExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static double Time(this Stopwatch sw, Action action, int iterations)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sw.Restart();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < iterations; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            action();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sw.Elapsed.TotalMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine#endregionDi2015NewLine
14130992Di2015UniqueSeparatorMessage               | DryRun1 | DryRun2 | FullRun1 | FullRun2Di2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLineTask.Factory.StartNew | 43.0592 | 50.847  | 452.2637 | 463.2310Di2015NewLineParallel.Invoke       | 10.5717 |  9.948  | 102.7767 | 101.1158 Di2015NewLine

14131727Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void UpdateProducts()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem((o) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DateTime start = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine            List<string> updatedProducts = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine            List<string[]> stock = new List<string[]>(File.ReadAllLines("G:\\\\Stock.txt").Select(line => line.Split('|')));Di2015NewLine            List<string> products = new List<string>(File.ReadAllLines("G:\\\\Products.txt"));Di2015NewLine            updatedProducts.Add(products[0]);Di2015NewLine            SetProgress(products.Count);Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in products)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (stock.Any(s => item.Contains(s[0]) && !item.EndsWith(s[1])))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string[] p = item.Split(',');Di2015NewLine                    int productStockIndex = Array.IndexOf(p, p.Last());Di2015NewLine                    int productNameIndex = productStockIndex - 1;Di2015NewLine                    string productName = p[productNameIndex].Replace("\\"", "");Di2015NewLine                    p[productStockIndex] = stock.First(stk => stk[0] == productName)[1];Di2015NewLine                    updatedProducts.Add(string.Join(",", p));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                UpdateProgress(updatedProducts.Count);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            File.WriteAllLines(@"G:\\Results.txt", updatedProducts.ToArray());Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SetProgress(int maxValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.Invoke((Action)delegate Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            progressBar1.Maximum = maxValue;Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void UpdateProgress(int value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.Invoke((Action)delegateDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            progressBar1.Value = value;Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        UpdateProducts();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14137582Di2015UniqueSeparatorFindEqualTypeWith
14137582Di2015UniqueSeparatorFindBaseClassWith
14137582Di2015UniqueSeparatorFindInterfaceWith
14137582Di2015UniqueSeparator// provide common base class or implemented interfaceDi2015NewLinepublic static Type FindEqualTypeWith(this Type typeLeft, Type typeRight)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(typeLeft == null || typeRight == null) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var commonBaseClass = typeLeft.FindBaseClassWith(typeRight) ?? typeof(object);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return commonBaseClass.Equals(typeof(object))Di2015NewLine            ? typeLeft.FindInterfaceWith(typeRight)Di2015NewLine            : commonBaseClass;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// searching for common base class (either concrete or abstract)Di2015NewLinepublic static Type FindBaseClassWith(this Type typeLeft, Type typeRight)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(typeLeft == null || typeRight == null) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return typeLeftDi2015NewLine            .GetClassHierarchy()Di2015NewLine            .Intersect(typeRight.GetClassHierarchy())Di2015NewLine            .FirstOrDefault(type => !type.IsInterface);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// searching for common implemented interfaceDi2015NewLine// it's possible for one class to implement multiple interfaces, Di2015NewLine// in this case return first common based interfaceDi2015NewLinepublic static Type FindInterfaceWith(this Type typeLeft, Type typeRight)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(typeLeft == null || typeRight == null) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return typeLeftDi2015NewLine            .GetInterfaceHierarchy()Di2015NewLine            .Intersect(typeRight.GetInterfaceHierarchy())Di2015NewLine            .FirstOrDefault();   Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// iterate on interface hierarhyDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<Type> GetInterfaceHierarchy(this Type type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(type.IsInterface) return new [] { type }.AsEnumerable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return typeDi2015NewLine            .GetInterfaces()Di2015NewLine            .OrderByDescending(current => current.GetInterfaces().Count())Di2015NewLine            .AsEnumerable();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// interate on class hierarhyDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<Type> GetClassHierarchy(this Type type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(type == null) yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Type typeInHierarchy = type;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return typeInHierarchy;Di2015NewLine        typeInHierarchy = typeInHierarchy.BaseType;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    while(typeInHierarchy != null && !typeInHierarchy.IsInterface);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14137582Di2015UniqueSeparatorFindInterfaceWith
14137582Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable
14137582Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<T>
14137582Di2015UniqueSeparatorFindInterfaceWith
14137582Di2015UniqueSeparatorFindInterfaceWith
14137582Di2015UniqueSeparatorIA
14137582Di2015UniqueSeparatorIB
14137582Di2015UniqueSeparator    public interface IBase {}Di2015NewLine    public interface ISomething {}Di2015NewLine    public interface IDerivied: IBase {}Di2015NewLine    public interface IDeriviedRight: IDerivied {}Di2015NewLine    public interface IDeriviedLeft: IDerivied, IDisposable {}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class AnotherDisposable: IDisposable {Di2015NewLine        public void Dispose() {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class DeriviedLeft: IDeriviedLeft {Di2015NewLine        public void Dispose() {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class SubDeriviedLeft: DeriviedLeft {}Di2015NewLine    public class SecondSubDeriviedLeft: DeriviedLeft {}Di2015NewLine    public class ThirdSubDeriviedLeft: DeriviedLeft, ISomething {}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class Another {}Di2015NewLine    public class DeriviedRight: IDeriviedRight {}Di2015NewLine

14139623Di2015UniqueSeparatorenum MyEnumDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Undefined,Di2015NewLine    Set,Di2015NewLine    ResetDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass MyEnumAttribute : AttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public MyEnumAttribute(MyEnum value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Value = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyEnum Value { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[MyEnum(MyEnum.Reset)]Di2015NewLineclass ResetClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[MyEnum(MyEnum.Set)]Di2015NewLineclass SetClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[MyEnum(MyEnum.Undefined)]Di2015NewLineclass UndefinedClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14139623Di2015UniqueSeparator//Populate a dictionary with ReflectionDi2015NewLinevar dictionary = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetTypes().Di2015NewLine    Select(t => new {t, Attribute = t.GetCustomAttribute(typeof (MyEnumAttribute))}).Di2015NewLine    Where(e => e.Attribute != null).Di2015NewLine    ToDictionary(e => (e.Attribute as MyEnumAttribute).Value, e => e.t);Di2015NewLine//Assume that you dynamically want an instance of ResetClassDi2015NewLinevar wanted = MyEnum.Reset;Di2015NewLinevar instance = Activator.CreateInstance(dictionary[wanted]);Di2015NewLine//The biggest downside is that instance will be of type object.Di2015NewLine//My solution in this case was making each of those classes implementDi2015NewLine//an interface or derive from a base class, so that their signaturesDi2015NewLine//would remain the same, but their behaviors would differ.Di2015NewLine

14139623Di2015UniqueSeparatorConstructorFactory
14139623Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class ConstructorFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static ObjectActivator<T> GetActivator<T>(ConstructorInfo ctor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var paramsInfo = ctor.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine        var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(object[]), "args");Di2015NewLine        var argsExp = new Expression[paramsInfo.Length];Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < paramsInfo.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Expression index = Expression.Constant(i);Di2015NewLine            var paramType = paramsInfo[i].ParameterType;Di2015NewLine            Expression paramAccessorExp = Expression.ArrayIndex(param, index);Di2015NewLine            Expression paramCastExp = Expression.Convert(paramAccessorExp, paramType);Di2015NewLine            argsExp[i] = paramCastExp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var newExp = Expression.New(ctor, argsExp);Di2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda(typeof(ObjectActivator<T>), newExp, param);Di2015NewLine        var compiled = (ObjectActivator<T>)lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine        return compiled;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Func<T> Create<T>(Type destType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ctor = destType.GetConstructors(BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance).First();Di2015NewLine        Func<ConstructorInfo, object> activatorMethod = GetActivator<Type>;Di2015NewLine        var method = typeof(ConstructorFactory).GetMethod(activatorMethod.Method.Name, BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLine        var generic = method.MakeGenericMethod(destType);Di2015NewLine        dynamic activator = generic.Invoke(null, new object[] { ctor });Di2015NewLine        return () => activator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    delegate T ObjectActivator<out T>(params object[] args);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14139623Di2015UniqueSeparatorActivator.CreateInstance
14139623Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar dictionary = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetTypes().Di2015NewLine    Select(t => new { t, Attribute = t.GetCustomAttribute(typeof(MyEnumAttribute)) }).Di2015NewLine    Where(e => e.Attribute != null).Di2015NewLine    ToDictionary(e => (e.Attribute as MyEnumAttribute).Value, Di2015NewLine                 e => ConstructorFactory.Create<object>(e.t));Di2015NewLinevar wanted = MyEnum.Reset;Di2015NewLinevar instance = dictionary[wanted]();Di2015NewLine

14140094Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void FixMisplacedCookie(CookieContainer cookieContainer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var misplacedCookie = cookieContainer.GetCookies(new Uri(Url))[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    misplacedCookie.Path = "/"; // instead of "/sintegra/servlet/hwsintco"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //place the cookie in thee right place...Di2015NewLine    cookieContainer.SetCookies(Di2015NewLine        new Uri("https://www.sefaz.rr.gov.br/"), Di2015NewLine        misplacedCookie.ToString());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14140094Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace XYZDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class CrawlerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const string Url = "https://www.sefaz.rr.gov.br/sintegra/servlet/hwsintco";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Crawl()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var cookieContainer = new CookieContainer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* initial GET Request */Di2015NewLine            var getRequest = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(Url);Di2015NewLine            getRequest.CookieContainer = cookieContainer;Di2015NewLine            ReadResponse(getRequest); // nothing to do with this, because captcha is f#@%ing dumb :)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* POST Request */Di2015NewLine            var postRequest = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(Url);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            postRequest.AllowAutoRedirect = false; // we'll do the redirect manually; .NET does it badlyDi2015NewLine            postRequest.CookieContainer = cookieContainer;Di2015NewLine            postRequest.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine            postRequest.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var postParameters =Di2015NewLine                "_EventName=E%27CONFIRMAR%27.&_EventGridId=&_EventRowId=&_MSG=&_CONINSEST=&" +Di2015NewLine                "_CONINSESTG=08775724000119&cfield=much&_VALIDATIONRESULT=1&BUTTON1=Confirmar&" +Di2015NewLine                "sCallerURL=";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var bytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(postParameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            postRequest.ContentLength = bytes.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (var requestStream = postRequest.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine                requestStream.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var webResponse = postRequest.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ReadResponse(postRequest); // not interested in this eitherDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var redirectLocation = webResponse.Headers[HttpResponseHeader.Location];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var finalGetRequest = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(redirectLocation);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Apply fix for the cookie */Di2015NewLine            FixMisplacedCookie(cookieContainer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* do the final request using the correct cookies. */Di2015NewLine            finalGetRequest.CookieContainer = cookieContainer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var responseText = ReadResponse(finalGetRequest);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(responseText); // Hooray!Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static string ReadResponse(HttpWebRequest getRequest)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var responseStream = getRequest.GetResponse().GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine            using (var sr = new StreamReader(responseStream, Encoding.UTF8))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return sr.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void FixMisplacedCookie(CookieContainer cookieContainer)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var misplacedCookie = cookieContainer.GetCookies(new Uri(Url))[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            misplacedCookie.Path = "/"; // instead of "/sintegra/servlet/hwsintco"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //place the cookie in thee right place...Di2015NewLine            cookieContainer.SetCookies(Di2015NewLine                new Uri("https://www.sefaz.rr.gov.br/"),Di2015NewLine                misplacedCookie.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14140854Di2015UniqueSeparator public System.Drawing.Bitmap ResizeImage(System.Drawing.Image image, int width, int height) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        //a holder for the result Di2015NewLine        Bitmap result = new Bitmap(width, height); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //use a graphics object to draw the resized image into the bitmap Di2015NewLine        using (Graphics graphics = Graphics.FromImage(result)) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            //set the resize quality modes to high quality Di2015NewLine            graphics.CompositingQuality = System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingQuality.HighQuality; Di2015NewLine            graphics.InterpolationMode = System.Drawing.Drawing2D.InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic; Di2015NewLine            graphics.SmoothingMode = System.Drawing.Drawing2D.SmoothingMode.HighQuality; Di2015NewLine            //draw the image into the target bitmap Di2015NewLine            graphics.DrawImage(image, 0, 0, result.Width, result.Height); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //return the resulting bitmap Di2015NewLine        return result; Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine

14143633Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Expression GetOrExpression( MethodCallExpression containsExpression )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var list = (IEnumerable)((ConstantExpression)containsExpression.Object).Value;Di2015NewLine    var p = containsExpression.Arguments[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression expression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(var item in list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var equal = Expression.Equal(p, item);Di2015NewLine        if(expression == null)Di2015NewLine            expression = equal;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            expression = Expression.OrElse(expression, equal);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return expression;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
