14145461Di2015UniqueSeparatorMaxPredicateConditionCount
14145461Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PredicateBuilder<TParameter>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const int MaxPredicateConditionCount = 500;Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<Expression<Func<TParameter, bool>>> _existingPredicates = new List<Expression<Func<TParameter, bool>>>(MaxPredicateConditionCount);Di2015NewLine    private readonly ParameterExpression _parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TParameter));Di2015NewLine    private Expression<Func<TParameter, bool>> _expression;Di2015NewLine    private Expression _workingPredicate;Di2015NewLine    private int _workingPredicateConditionCount;Di2015NewLine    public bool Built { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Expression<Func<TParameter, bool>> LambdaExpressionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!Built)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return _expression;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddCondition<TValue>(string propertyName, TValue value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Built)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("Predicate has already been built");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var property = Expression.Property(_parameter, propertyName);Di2015NewLine        var constant = Expression.Constant(value, typeof(TValue));Di2015NewLine        var equality = Expression.Equal(property, constant);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_workingPredicate == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _workingPredicate = equality;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (MaxPredicateConditionCount < ++_workingPredicateConditionCount)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var compiledWorking = Expression.Lambda<Func<TParameter, bool>>(_workingPredicate, _parameter).Compile();Di2015NewLine                _existingPredicates.Add(p => compiledWorking(p));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (_existingPredicates.Count + 1 > MaxPredicateConditionCount)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var compiled = BuildExistingPredicates().Compile();Di2015NewLine                    _existingPredicates.Clear();Di2015NewLine                    _existingPredicates.Add(p => compiled(p));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _workingPredicate = equality;Di2015NewLine                _workingPredicateConditionCount = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _workingPredicate = Expression.OrElse(_workingPredicate, equality);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Expression<Func<TParameter, bool>> BuildExistingPredicates()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expression compileTemp = Expression.Invoke(_existingPredicates[0], _parameter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var i = 1; i < _existingPredicates.Count; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var nextCall = Expression.Invoke(_existingPredicates[i], _parameter);Di2015NewLine            compileTemp = Expression.OrElse(compileTemp, nextCall);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<TParameter, bool>>(compileTemp, _parameter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Build()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Built = true;Di2015NewLine        //There were no conditions, assume trueDi2015NewLine        if (_workingPredicate == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _expression = x => true;Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _existingPredicates.Add(Expression.Lambda<Func<TParameter, bool>>(_workingPredicate, _parameter));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _expression = BuildExistingPredicates();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _existingPredicates.Clear();Di2015NewLine        _workingPredicate = null;Di2015NewLine        _workingPredicateConditionCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Func<TParameter, bool> Compile()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!Built)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Build();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _expression.Compile();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14148493Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DataSet ds = new DataSet();Di2015NewLine    ds = DataProvider.Connect_Select("SELECT * FROM Menu");Di2015NewLine    DataTable table = ds.Tables[0];Di2015NewLine    DataRow[] parentMenus = table.Select("ParentId = 0");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    string unorderedList = GenerateUL(parentMenus, table,sb);Di2015NewLine    Response.Write(unorderedList);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate string GenerateUL(DataRow[] menu,DataTable table,StringBuilder sb)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    sb.AppendLine("<ul>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (menu.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (DataRow dr in menu)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string handler = dr["Handler"].ToString();Di2015NewLine            string menuText = dr["MENU"].ToString();Di2015NewLine            string line = String.Format(@"<li><a href=""{0}"">{1}</a>",handler,menuText);Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(line);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string pid = dr["PID"].ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            DataRow[]subMenu = table.Select(String.Format("ParentId = {0}", pid));Di2015NewLine            if (subMenu.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var subMenuBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(GenerateUL(subMenu, table, subMenuBuilder));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            sb.Append("</li>");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sb.Append("</ul>");Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14148493Di2015UniqueSeparatorParentId != PID
14148493Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string GenerateUL(DataRow[] menu, DataTable table, StringBuilder sb)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    sb.AppendLine("<ul>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (menu.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (DataRow dr in menu)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string handler = dr["Handler"].ToString();Di2015NewLine            string menuText = dr["MENU"].ToString();Di2015NewLine            string line = String.Format(@"<li><a href=""{0}"">{1}</a>", handler, menuText);Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(line);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string pid = dr["PID"].ToString();Di2015NewLine            string parentId = dr["ParentId"].ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            DataRow[] subMenu = table.Select(String.Format("ParentId = {0}", pid));Di2015NewLine            if (subMenu.Length > 0 && !pid.Equals(parentId))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var subMenuBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(GenerateUL(subMenu, table, subMenuBuilder));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            sb.Append("</li>");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sb.Append("</ul>");Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

                      "machine[safe_token]",Di2015NewLine                                    safe_token);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Include the file in the post dataDi2015NewLine 14148939Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Specialized;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication3Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<double>[] Reg = new List<double>[2]; for (int i = 0; i < Reg.Length; i++) { Reg[i] = new List<double>(); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++)Di2015NewLine            { Reg[1].Add(1.0); }            //Dummy dataDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var obj = ClassFactory.CreateStep("AmplifySignal");Di2015NewLine            object[] Args = obj.DeserializeProperties(" ");Di2015NewLine            Args[0] = Reg;Di2015NewLine            dynamic result = obj.Run(Args);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (result != null)Di2015NewLine            { Thread.Sleep(0); }    //breakpointDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static class ClassFactoryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static readonly IDictionary<String, Type> _recipe_instructions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static ClassFactory() { _recipe_instructions = MapIFactory(); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static IDictionary<string, Type> MapIFactory()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get the assembly that contains this codeDi2015NewLine            Assembly asm = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get a list of all the types in the assemblyDi2015NewLine            Type[] allTypes = asm.GetTypes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var d = new Dictionary<string, Type>();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var type in allTypes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (type.IsClass && !type.IsAbstract && type.GetInterface(typeof(IFactory).ToString()) != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Create a temporary instance of that class...Di2015NewLine                    object inst = asm.CreateInstance(type.FullName, true, BindingFlags.CreateInstance, null, null, null, null);Di2015NewLine                    if (inst != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // And generate the product classes keyDi2015NewLine                        IFactory mapKey = (IFactory)inst;Di2015NewLine                        object key = mapKey.GetFactoryKey();Di2015NewLine                        inst = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Add the results to a Dictionary with the Name as a key and the Type as the valueDi2015NewLine                        d.Add((string)key, type);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return d;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal static IFactory CreateStep(String key)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Type type;Di2015NewLine            if (_recipe_instructions.TryGetValue(key, out type))Di2015NewLine            { return (IFactory)Activator.CreateInstance(type); }Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException(String.Format("Unable to locate key: {0}", key));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public interface IFactoryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string GetFactoryKey();Di2015NewLine        string SerializeProperties();Di2015NewLine        object[] DeserializeProperties(string args);Di2015NewLine        dynamic Run(params object[] args);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class AmplifySignal : IFactoryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string GetFactoryKey()Di2015NewLine        { return MethodBase.GetCurrentMethod().DeclaringType.Name; }Di2015NewLine        public object[] DeserializeProperties(string args)Di2015NewLine        { return new object[] { null, (int)1, (double)2.1 }; }Di2015NewLine        public string SerializeProperties()Di2015NewLine        { return " 1 | 2.1 "; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public dynamic Run(params object[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Build InputsDi2015NewLine            List<double>[] registers = (List<double>[])args[0];Di2015NewLine            List<double> waveform = (List<double>)registers[(int)args[1]];Di2015NewLine            double factor = (double)args[2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Do WorkDi2015NewLine            double[] Result = waveform.ToArray();      //Localize and Deep CopyDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < Result.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            { Result[i] *= factor; }Di2015NewLine            List<double> result = Result.ToList();    //breakpointDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Write ResultDi2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14149033Di2015UniqueSeparatorStack<Uri> history= new Stack<Uri>();Di2015NewLineUri current = null; Di2015NewLineprivate void WebBrowser_Navigated(object sender, System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Uri previous = null;           Di2015NewLine    if (history.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        previous = history.Peek();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This assumption is NOT always right. Di2015NewLine    // if the page had a forward reference that creates a loop (e.g. A->B->A ), Di2015NewLine    // we would not detect it, we assume it is an A -> B -> back () Di2015NewLine    if (e.Uri == previous)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        history.Pop();                     Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (current != null)Di2015NewLine            history.Push(current);                          Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    current = e.Uri; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14149033Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected override void OnBackKeyPress(System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    base.OnBackKeyPress(e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!isPerformingCloseOperation) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (history.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {                        Di2015NewLine            Uri destination = history.Peek();Di2015NewLine            webBrowser.Navigate(destination);Di2015NewLine            // What about using script and going history.back? Di2015NewLine            // you can do it, but Di2015NewLine            // I rather use that to keep ‘track’ consistently with our stack Di2015NewLine            e.Cancel = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14149318Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var binding = new BasicHttpBinding();Di2015NewLine    var endpoint = new EndpointAddress("http://localhost:8080/");Di2015NewLine    using (var factory = new ChannelFactory<IPerson>(binding, endpoint))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var request = new Dictionary<Guid, Person>();Di2015NewLine        request[Guid.NewGuid()] = new Person { Name = "Bob", Email = "Bob@abc.com" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var client = factory.CreateChannel();Di2015NewLine        var result = client.SetCustomer(request);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Name: {0} | Email: {1}", result.Name, result.Email);Di2015NewLine        factory.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14149465Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<AaaUserContactInfo> getcontactinfo(long[] organizationIds)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var organizationNames = entities.SDOrganizationsDi2015NewLine                           .Where(org => organizationIds.Contains(org.ORG_ID))Di2015NewLine                           .Select(org=> org.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var result = from userContactInfo in entities.AaaUserContactInfoesDi2015NewLine                 join contactInfo in entities.AaaContactInfoes on userContactInfo.CONTACTINFO_ID equals contactInfo.CONTACTINFO_IDDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                 //check if EMAILID string has at least one organizationName as substringDi2015NewLine                 where organizationNames.Any(orgName => contactInfo.EMAILID.ToString().Contains(orgName))Di2015NewLine                 select userContactInfo;Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14151206Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string SearchDirectory(string path, string pattern)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var regex = new Regex(pattern);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var d in Directory.GetDirectories(path))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var dirName = d.Substring(d.LastIndexOf('\\\\') + 1);Di2015NewLine        if (regex.IsMatch(dirName)) return d;Di2015NewLine        SearchDirectory(d, pattern);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine    //Or throw an ExceptionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14151273Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface INullValueDictionary<T, U>Di2015NewLine    where U : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    U this[T key] { get; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class NullValueDictionary<T, U> : Dictionary<T, U>, INullValueDictionary<T, U>Di2015NewLine    where U : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    U INullValueDictionary<T, U>.this[T key]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            U val;Di2015NewLine            dict.TryGet(key, out val);Di2015NewLine            return val;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14151893Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid UpdateFarm()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Start with a list of antisocial animals from least to most happy.Di2015NewLine    var antisocialAnimals = GetAntisocialAnimals().OrderBy(x => x.Happiness);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Initialise the social animals to the global maximum. Note theDi2015NewLine    // global maximum is the happiest antisocial animal. This is done toDi2015NewLine    // avoid the case where an antisocial animal's happiness has increased,Di2015NewLine    // so some of the social animals are too unhappy.Di2015NewLine    var maxHappiness = antisocialAnimals.Last().Happiness;Di2015NewLine    var socialAnimals = GetSocialAnimals();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var socialAnimal in socialAnimals)Di2015NewLine        socialAnimal.Happiness = maxHappiness;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Now iterate from least to most happy, propagating up the friend chain.Di2015NewLine    foreach (var antisocialAnimal in antisocialAnimals)Di2015NewLine        UpdateFriends(antisocialAnimal);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// To propagate a happiness change, we just find all friends with a higherDi2015NewLine// happiness and then lower them, then find their friends and so on.Di2015NewLinevoid UpdateFriends(Animal animal)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var friends = GetFriends(animal); // Friends with this animal, not friends of.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var friend in friends.Where(x => x.Happiness > animal.Happiness))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        friend.Happiness = animal.Happiness;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Since this friend's happiness has changed, we now need to updateDi2015NewLine        // its friends too.Di2015NewLine        UpdateFriends(friend);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14152210Di2015UniqueSeparator    CloudStorageAccount storageAccount = new CloudStorageAccount(new StorageCredentials(accountName, accountKey), true);Di2015NewLineCloudBlobClient cloudBlobClient = storageAccount.CreateCloudBlobClient();Di2015NewLineCloudBlobContainer sourceContainer = cloudBlobClient.GetContainerReference(containerName);Di2015NewLineCloudBlobContainer targetContainer = cloudBlobClient.GetContainerReference(targetContainerName);Di2015NewLinestring blobName = "<Blob Name e.g. myblob.txt>";Di2015NewLineCloudBlockBlob sourceBlob = sourceContainer.GetBlockBlobReference(blobName);Di2015NewLineCloudBlockBlob targetBlob = targetContainer.GetBlockBlobReference(blobName);Di2015NewLinetargetBlob.StartCopyFromBlob(sourceBlob);Di2015NewLine

14160254Di2015UniqueSeparator    [TestMethod]Di2015NewLine    public void MyTest()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Helper.RunInWpfSyncContext( async () =>Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        Assert.IsNotNull( SynchronizationContext.Current );Di2015NewLine        await MyTestAsync();Di2015NewLine        DoSomethingOnTheSameThread();Di2015NewLine      });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
14160254Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Windows.Threading; // WPF Dispatcher from assembly 'WindowsBase'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void RunInWpfSyncContext( Func<Task> function )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (function == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("function");Di2015NewLine  var prevCtx = SynchronizationContext.Current;Di2015NewLine  tryDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var syncCtx = new DispatcherSynchronizationContext();Di2015NewLine    SynchronizationContext.SetSynchronizationContext(syncCtx);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var task = function();Di2015NewLine    if (task == null) throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var frame = new DispatcherFrame();Di2015NewLine    var t2 = task.ContinueWith(x=>{frame.Continue = false;}, TaskScheduler.Default);Di2015NewLine    Dispatcher.PushFrame(frame);   // execute all tasks until frame.Continue == falseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    task.GetAwaiter().GetResult(); // rethrow exception when task has failed Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  finallyDi2015NewLine  { Di2015NewLine    SynchronizationContext.SetSynchronizationContext(prevCtx);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14164982Di2015UniqueSeparatorbyte

14164982Di2015UniqueSeparatorT
14164982Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Foo()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (typeof(T) == typeof(byte))Di2015NewLine    readMethod = (Action<T[]>)(Delegate)(Action<byte[]>)ExternalAPI.Read;Di2015NewLine  else if (typeof(T) == typeof(int))Di2015NewLine    readMethod = (Action<T[]>)(Delegate)(Action<int[]>)ExternalAPI.Read;Di2015NewLine  else if (typeof(T) == typeof(float))Di2015NewLine    readMethod = (Action<T[]>)(Delegate)(Action<float[]>)ExternalAPI.Read;Di2015NewLine  else if (typeof(T) == typeof(double))Di2015NewLine    readMethod = (Action<T[]>)(Delegate)(Action<double[]>)ExternalAPI.Read;Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine    throw new Exception("The type parameter T can't be " + typeof(T));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14164982Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Foo()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var methInfo = typeof(ExternalAPI).GetMethod("Read", new[] { typeof(T[]), });Di2015NewLine  if (methInfo == null)Di2015NewLine    throw new Exception("ExternalAPI has no suitable method for " + typeof(T[]));Di2015NewLine  readMethod = (Action<T[]>)Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Action<T[]>), methInfo);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14170905Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.Win32;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// RenameRegistryKey © Copyright 2006 Active ComputingDi2015NewLinenamespace RenameRegistryKeyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class RegistryUtilitiesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Renames a subkey of the passed in registry key since Di2015NewLine        /// the Framework totally forgot to include such a handy feature.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="regKey">The RegistryKey that contains the subkey Di2015NewLine        /// you want to rename (must be writeable)</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="subKeyName">The name of the subkey that you want to renameDi2015NewLine        /// </param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="newSubKeyName">The new name of the RegistryKey</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>True if succeeds</returns>Di2015NewLine        public bool RenameSubKey(RegistryKey parentKey, Di2015NewLine            string subKeyName, string newSubKeyName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CopyKey(parentKey, subKeyName, newSubKeyName);Di2015NewLine            parentKey.DeleteSubKeyTree(subKeyName);Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Copy a registry key.  The parentKey must be writeable.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="parentKey"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="keyNameToCopy"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="newKeyName"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public bool CopyKey(RegistryKey parentKey, Di2015NewLine            string keyNameToCopy, string newKeyName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Create new keyDi2015NewLine            RegistryKey destinationKey = parentKey.CreateSubKey(newKeyName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Open the sourceKey we are copying fromDi2015NewLine            RegistryKey sourceKey = parentKey.OpenSubKey(keyNameToCopy);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            RecurseCopyKey(sourceKey, destinationKey);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void RecurseCopyKey(RegistryKey sourceKey, RegistryKey destinationKey)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //copy all the valuesDi2015NewLine            foreach (string valueName in sourceKey.GetValueNames())Di2015NewLine            {        Di2015NewLine                object objValue = sourceKey.GetValue(valueName);Di2015NewLine                RegistryValueKind valKind = sourceKey.GetValueKind(valueName);Di2015NewLine                destinationKey.SetValue(valueName, objValue, valKind);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //For Each subKey Di2015NewLine            //Create a new subKey in destinationKey Di2015NewLine            //Call myself Di2015NewLine            foreach (string sourceSubKeyName in sourceKey.GetSubKeyNames())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                RegistryKey sourceSubKey = sourceKey.OpenSubKey(sourceSubKeyName);Di2015NewLine                RegistryKey destSubKey = destinationKey.CreateSubKey(sourceSubKeyName);Di2015NewLine                RecurseCopyKey(sourceSubKey, destSubKey);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

(propChange == null) return;Di2015NewLine        propChange(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs(propertyName));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14177153Di2015UniqueSeparatordef rgb_xyz(r, g, b): # 2o. D65Di2015NewLine    triple = [r, g, b]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    v, d = 0.04045, 12.94Di2015NewLine    for i, c in enumerate(triple):Di2015NewLine        triple[i] = 100 * (c / d if c <= v else ((c + 0.055)/1.055)**2.4)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    multipliers = (Di2015NewLine            (0.4124, 0.3576, 0.1805),Di2015NewLine            (0.2126, 0.7152, 0.0722),Di2015NewLine            (0.0193, 0.1192, 0.9505))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    x, y, z = [sum(row[i] * triple[i] for i in range(3))Di2015NewLine            for row in multipliers]Di2015NewLine    return x, y, zDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedef xyz_cielab(x, y, z):Di2015NewLine    triple = [x, y, z]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    t0, a, b = 0.008856, 7.787, 16/116.Di2015NewLine    ref = (95.047, 100.0, 108.883)Di2015NewLine    for i, c in enumerate(triple):Di2015NewLine        triple[i] /= ref[i]Di2015NewLine        c = triple[i]Di2015NewLine        triple[i] = c ** (1/3.) if c > t0 else a * c + bDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    l = 116 * triple[0] - 16Di2015NewLine    a = 500 * (triple[0] - triple[1])Di2015NewLine    b = 200 * (triple[1] - triple[2])Di2015NewLine    return l, a, bDi2015NewLine

14179916Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void UpdateTotalBytesTransferred(FileMessage message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long previousStreamPosition = 0;Di2015NewLine        long totalBytesTransferredShouldBe = TotalBytesTransferred + message.FileMetaData.ChunkLength;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Timer timer = new Timer(500f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        timer.Elapsed += (sender, e) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (TotalBytesTransferred + (message.ChunkData.Position - previousStreamPosition) < totalBytesTransferredShouldBe)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TotalBytesTransferred += message.ChunkData.Position - previousStreamPosition;Di2015NewLine                previousStreamPosition = message.ChunkData.Position;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                timer.Stop();Di2015NewLine                timer.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        timer.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14180413Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T ParseFlags<T>(string value) where T : structDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T result;Di2015NewLine    ulong temp;Di2015NewLine    if (Enum.TryParse(value, out result))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string hexNum = value.StartsWith("0x") ? value.Substring(2) : value;Di2015NewLine    if (ulong.TryParse(hexNum, NumberStyles.HexNumber, null, out temp))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (T)Enum.ToObject(typeof(T), temp);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentException("value could not be parsed");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14180828Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static string ReadLine(this DataReader stream, ref int maxLength, Encoding encoding, char? termChar)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var maxLengthSpecified = maxLength > 0;Di2015NewLine    int i;Di2015NewLine    byte b = 0, b0;Di2015NewLine    var read = false;Di2015NewLine    using (var mem = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            b0 = b;Di2015NewLine            i = stream.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine            if (i == -1) break;Di2015NewLine            else read = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            b = (byte)i;Di2015NewLine            if (maxLengthSpecified) maxLength--;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (maxLengthSpecified && mem.Length == 1 && b == termChar && b0 == termChar)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                maxLength++;Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (b == 10 || b == 13)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (mem.Length == 0 && b == 10)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            mem.WriteByte(b);Di2015NewLine            if (maxLengthSpecified && maxLength == 0)Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (mem.Length == 0 && !read) return null;Di2015NewLine        return encoding.GetString(mem.ToArray(), 0, (int)mem.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14181937Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Web.UI.WebControls;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data.SqlClient;Di2015NewLineusing System.Configuration;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLinepublic partial class MakeAppointment : System.Web.UI.PageDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected void Button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string appointmentdate = Convert.ToString(DropDownListDay.Text + "-" + DropDownListMonth.Text + "-" + DropDownListYear.Text);Di2015NewLine        string appointmenttime = Convert.ToString(DropDownListHour.Text + ":" + DropDownListMinute.Text + ":" + DropDownListSecond.Text + " " + DropDownListSession.Text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (SqlConnection con = new SqlConnection("Data Source=USER-PC;Initial Catalog=webservice_database;Integrated Security=True"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            con.Open();Di2015NewLine            SqlCommand date = new SqlCommand("Select adate from customer_registration where adate='" + appointmentdate + "'", con);Di2015NewLine            string ddate = date.ExecuteScalar().ToString();Di2015NewLine            if (ddate == appointmentdate)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SqlCommand time = new SqlCommand("Select atime from customer_registration where atime='" + appointmenttime + "'", con);Di2015NewLine                var rtime = time.ExecuteScalar();Di2015NewLine                if (rtime != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string dtime = rtime.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (dtime == appointmenttime)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        MessageBox.Show("This appointment is not available. 14182111Di2015UniqueSeparatoryield
14182111Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace SOPlayersOrderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Represents a match up between two players.Di2015NewLine        /// It is tempting to use strings for everything, but don't do it,Di2015NewLine        /// you'll only end up having to split those strings and you willDi2015NewLine        /// not benefit from type safety.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public class MatchUpDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public string Player1 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine            public string Player2 { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return string.Format("{0} vs {1}", Player1, Player2);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<MatchUp> PairPlayers(List<string> players)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var results = new List<MatchUp>();Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < players.Count - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int j = i + 1; j < players.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var matchup = new MatchUp { Player1 = players[i], Player2 = players[j] };Di2015NewLine                    //yield return matchup; //this is how Jon Skeet suggested, I am showing you "eager" evaluationDi2015NewLine                    results.Add(matchup);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return results;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<MatchUp> OrganiseGames(IEnumerable<string> players, IEnumerable<MatchUp> games)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var results = new List<MatchUp>();Di2015NewLine            //a list that we will treat as a queue - most recently played at the back of the queueDi2015NewLine            var playerStack = new List<string>(players);Di2015NewLine            //a list that we can modifyDi2015NewLine            var gamesList = new List<MatchUp>(games);Di2015NewLine            while (gamesList.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //find a game for the top player on the stackDi2015NewLine                var player1 = playerStack.First();Di2015NewLine                var player2 = playerStack.Skip(1).First();Di2015NewLine                //the players are in the order of least recently played firstDi2015NewLine                MatchUp matchUp = FindFirstAvailableGame(playerStack, gamesList);Di2015NewLine                //drop the players that just played to the back of the listDi2015NewLine                playerStack.Remove(matchUp.Player1);Di2015NewLine                playerStack.Remove(matchUp.Player2);Di2015NewLine                playerStack.Add(matchUp.Player1);Di2015NewLine                playerStack.Add(matchUp.Player2);Di2015NewLine                //remove that pairingDi2015NewLine                gamesList.Remove(matchUp);Di2015NewLine                //yield return matchUp; //optional way of doing thisDi2015NewLine                results.Add(matchUp);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return results;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static MatchUp FindFirstAvailableGame(List<string> players, List<MatchUp> gamesList)Di2015NewLine        {            Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < players.Count - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int j = i + 1; j < players.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var game = gamesList.FirstOrDefault(g => g.Player1 == players[i] && g.Player2 == players[j] ||Di2015NewLine                                                             g.Player2 == players[i] && g.Player1 == players[j]);Di2015NewLine                    if (game != null) return game;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Didn't find a game");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var players = new List<string>(new []{"A","B","C","D","E"});Di2015NewLine            var allGames = new List<MatchUp>(PairPlayers(players));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Unorganised");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var game in allGames)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(game);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Organised");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var game in OrganiseGames(players, allGames))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(game);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14184395Di2015UniqueSeparatorToken
14184395Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass TokenDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<string> GetAllValues()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(IsRange(Value))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var rangeValues = Value.Split(new[] {'[', '-', ']'}, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLine            //numeric format defines minimal string length. [01-10] will have numericFormat = "{0:00}"Di2015NewLine            string numericFormat = CreateNumericFormat(rangeValues.ElementAt(0).Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int[] ranges = rangeValues.Select(val => int.Parse(val)).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var val in GetRange(ranges[0], ranges[1]))Di2015NewLine                yield return string.Format(numericFormat, val);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //validation is ommitedDi2015NewLine    private bool IsRange(string val)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Value.Contains("-");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private string CreateNumericFormat(int minimalLength)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return "{0:"+new string('0', minimalLength)+"}";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<int> GetRange(int minValue, int maxValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Enumerable.Range(minValue, maxValue - minValue + 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14184395Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar initial = "12[05-10]3[008-010]";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar regularExp = @"\\[\\s*\\d+\\s*-\\s*\\d+\\s*\\]|\\d+";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineList<Token> tokens = new List<Token>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (Match match in Regex.Matches(initial , regularExp ))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tokens.Add(new Token {Value = match.Value});Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIEnumerable<string> result = new []{""};//empty source for startDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach(var token in tokens)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    result = from v1 in resultDi2015NewLine             from v2 in token.GetAllValues()Di2015NewLine             select v1 + v2;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine//Dump is LinqPad specific callDi2015NewLineresult.Dump();Di2015NewLine

14184934Di2015UniqueSeparatorsinVal = abs(sin(angle))Di2015NewLinecosVal = abs(cos(angle))Di2015NewLinenewImgWidth = sinVal * oldImgHeight + cos(angle) * oldImgWidthDi2015NewLinenewImgHeight = sinVal * oldImgWidth + cos(angle) * oldImgHeightDi2015NewLineoriginX = 0Di2015NewLineoriginY = sinVal * oldImgWidthDi2015NewLine
14184934Di2015UniqueSeparatororiginX = sinVal * oldImgHeightDi2015NewLineoriginY = 0Di2015NewLine
14184934Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Bitmap RotateImg(Bitmap bmp, float angle, Color bkColor)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    angle = angle % 360;Di2015NewLine    if (angle > 180)Di2015NewLine        angle -= 360;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat pf = default(System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLine    if (bkColor == Color.Transparent)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        pf = System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        pf = bmp.PixelFormat;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float sin = (float)Math.Abs(Math.Sin(angle * Math.PI / 180.0)); // this function takes radiansDi2015NewLine    float cos = (float)Math.Abs(Math.Cos(angle * Math.PI / 180.0)); // this one tooDi2015NewLine    float newImgWidth = sin * bmp.Height + cos * bmp.Width;Di2015NewLine    float newImgHeight = sin * bmp.Width + cos * bmp.Height;Di2015NewLine    float originX = 0f;Di2015NewLine    float originY = 0f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (angle > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (angle <= 90)Di2015NewLine            originX = sin * bmp.Height;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            originX = newImgWidth;Di2015NewLine            originY = newImgHeight - sin * bmp.Width;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (angle >= -90)Di2015NewLine        originY = sin * bmp.Width;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            originX = newImgWidth - sin * bmp.Height;Di2015NewLine            originY = newImgHeight;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Bitmap newImg = new Bitmap((int)newImgWidth, (int)newImgHeight, pf);Di2015NewLine    Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(newImg);Di2015NewLine    g.Clear(bkColor);Di2015NewLine    g.TranslateTransform(originX, originY); // offset the origin to our calculated valuesDi2015NewLine    g.RotateTransform(angle); // set up rotateDi2015NewLine    g.InterpolationMode = System.Drawing.Drawing2D.InterpolationMode.HighQualityBilinear;Di2015NewLine    g.DrawImageUnscaled(bmp, 0, 0); // draw the image at 0, 0Di2015NewLine    g.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return newImg;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14198311Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CsvParserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<List<string>> entries = new List<List<string>>();Di2015NewLine    private string currentEntry = "";Di2015NewLine    private bool insideQuotation;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///   Returns all scanned entries.Di2015NewLine    ///   Outer IEnumerable = rows,Di2015NewLine    ///   inner IEnumerable = columns of the corresponding row.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<IEnumerable<string>> EntriesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return entries; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ScanNextLine(string line)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // At the beginning of the lineDi2015NewLine        if (!insideQuotation)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            entries.Add(new List<string>());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The characters of the lineDi2015NewLine        foreach (char c in line)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (insideQuotation)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (c == '"')Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    insideQuotation = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    currentEntry += c;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (c == ',')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                entries[entries.Count - 1].Add(currentEntry);Di2015NewLine                currentEntry = "";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (c == '"')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                insideQuotation = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                currentEntry += c;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // At the end of the lineDi2015NewLine        if (!insideQuotation)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            entries[entries.Count - 1].Add(currentEntry);Di2015NewLine            currentEntry = "";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            currentEntry += "\\n";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinternal class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string dir = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.BaseDirectory + @"blogpost";Di2015NewLine        string[] allLines = File.ReadAllLines(dir + "csvdatabase.csv");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CsvParser parser = new CsvParser();Di2015NewLine        foreach (string line in allLines )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            parser.ScanNextLine(line);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14207428Di2015UniqueSeparatorformat
14207428Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar format = new MessageFormatDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Initialize your formatDi2015NewLine};Di2015NewLine//Gets every instance public field in the typeDi2015NewLine//Expects it to be either byte, either byte[]Di2015NewLine//Extracts value, length and typeDi2015NewLinevar fields = typeof (MessageFormat).GetFields().Di2015NewLine    Select(f => f.GetValue(format)).Di2015NewLine    Select(v => newDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Value = v,Di2015NewLine        Type = v is byte ? typeof (byte) : typeof (byte[]),Di2015NewLine        Length = v is byte ? 1 : (v as byte[]).LengthDi2015NewLine    }).Di2015NewLine    ToArray();Di2015NewLine//Calculates the resulting array's lengthDi2015NewLinevar totalLength = fields.Sum(v => v.Length);Di2015NewLinevar bytes = new byte[totalLength];Di2015NewLinevar writingIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineforeach (var field in fields)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //If the field is a byte, write at current index,Di2015NewLine    //then increment the indexDi2015NewLine    if (field.Type == typeof (byte))Di2015NewLine        bytes[writingIndex++] = (byte) field.Value;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Otherwise, use a performant memory copy methodDi2015NewLine        var source = field.Value as byte[];Di2015NewLine        var sourceLength = source.Length;Di2015NewLine        Buffer.BlockCopy(source, 0, bytes, writingIndex, sourceLength);Di2015NewLine        writingIndex += sourceLength;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14207913Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class Call : MarkupExtensionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string ActionName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public Call(string actionName) { ActionName = actionName; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override object ProvideValue(IServiceProvider serviceProvider)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IProvideValueTarget targetProvider = serviceProviderDi2015NewLine                .GetService(typeof(IProvideValueTarget)) as IProvideValueTarget;Di2015NewLine            if (targetProvider == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException(@"The CallAction extension Di2015NewLine                can't retrieved the IProvideValueTarget service.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var target = targetProvider.TargetObject as FrameworkElement;Di2015NewLine            if (target == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException(@"The CallAction extension Di2015NewLine                    can only be used on a FrameworkElement.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (targetProvider.TargetProperty is MethodInfo)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var targetEventAddMethod = targetProvider.TargetProperty as MethodInfo;Di2015NewLine                if (targetEventAddMethod != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ParameterInfo[] pars = targetEventAddMethod.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine                    Type delegateType = pars[1].ParameterType;Di2015NewLine                    MethodInfo methodInfo = this.GetType().GetMethod("MyProxyHandler", BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine                    return Delegate.CreateDelegate(delegateType, this, methodInfo); ;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (targetProvider.TargetProperty is EventInfo)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var targetEventInfo = targetProvider.TargetProperty as EventInfo;Di2015NewLine                if (targetEventInfo != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Type delegateType = targetEventInfo.EventHandlerType;Di2015NewLine                    MethodInfo methodInfo = this.GetType().GetMethod("MyProxyHandler", BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine                    return Delegate.CreateDelegate(delegateType, this, methodInfo);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void MyProxyHandler(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FrameworkElement target = sender as FrameworkElement;Di2015NewLine            if (target == null) return;Di2015NewLine            var dataContext = target.DataContext;Di2015NewLine            if (dataContext == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //get the method on the datacontext from its nameDi2015NewLine            MethodInfo methodInfo = dataContext.GetType()Di2015NewLine                .GetMethod(ActionName, BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine            methodInfo.Invoke(dataContext, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14210169Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string LinksToHTML(string str)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         Regex urlRx = new Regex(@"(?<url>((mailto\\:|(news|(ht|f)tp(s?))\\://){1}\\S+))", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MatchCollection matches = urlRx.Matches(str);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Match match in matches)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var url = match.Groups["url"].Value;Di2015NewLine            str = str.Replace(url, string.Format("<a href=\\"{0}\\" target=\\"blank\\">{1}</a>", url, (url.Length > 40 ? url.Substring(0, 40) + "..." : url)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //str = str.Replace(url, string.Format("<a href=\\"{0}\\" target=\\"blank\\">{1}</a>", url, url));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return str;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14211678Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Call : MarkupExtensionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Call() { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string MethodName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IProvideValueTarget targetProvider = serviceProvider.GetService(typeof(IProvideValueTarget)) as IProvideValueTarget;Di2015NewLine        if (targetProvider != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var target = targetProvider.TargetObject as FrameworkElement;Di2015NewLine            if (target != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (targetProvider.TargetProperty is MethodInfo)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var targetEventAddMethod = targetProvider.TargetProperty as MethodInfo;Di2015NewLine                    if (targetEventAddMethod != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var delegateType = targetEventAddMethod.GetParameters()[1].ParameterType;Di2015NewLine                        var methodInfo = this.GetType().GetMethod("MyProxyHandler", BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine                        return Delegate.CreateDelegate(delegateType, this, methodInfo); ;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (targetProvider.TargetProperty is EventInfo)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var targetEventInfo = targetProvider.TargetProperty as EventInfo;Di2015NewLine                    if (targetEventInfo != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var delegateType = targetEventInfo.EventHandlerType;Di2015NewLine                        MethodInfo methodInfo = this.GetType().GetMethod("MyProxyHandler", BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine                        return Delegate.CreateDelegate(delegateType, this, methodInfo);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void MyProxyHandler(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FrameworkElement target = sender as FrameworkElement;Di2015NewLine        if (target == null) return;Di2015NewLine        var dataContext = target.DataContext;Di2015NewLine        if (dataContext == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //get the method on the datacontext from its nameDi2015NewLine        MethodInfo methodInfo = dataContext.GetType().GetMethod(MethodName, BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ElementName))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var element = FindVisualChildren(dataContext as DependencyObject).FirstOrDefault(c => c.Name.Equals(ElementName));Di2015NewLine            if (element != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var path = element.GetType().GetProperty(Path);Di2015NewLine                if (path != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    methodInfo.Invoke(dataContext, new object[] { path.GetValue(element, null) });Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Path))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var path = dataContext.GetType().GetProperty(Path);Di2015NewLine            if (path != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                methodInfo.Invoke(dataContext, new object[] { path.GetValue(dataContext, null) });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        methodInfo.Invoke(dataContext,null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<FrameworkElement> FindVisualChildren(DependencyObject obj) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(obj); i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DependencyObject child = VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(obj, i);Di2015NewLine            if (child != null && child is FrameworkElement)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return (FrameworkElement)child;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            var childOfChild = FindVisualChildren(child);Di2015NewLine            if (childOfChild != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (var subchild in childOfChild)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return subchild;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14211951Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE FUNCTION FNHTMLDECODE (@REMARKS NVARCHAR(MAX))Di2015NewLineRETURNS NVARCHAR(MAX) AS  Di2015NewLineBEGIN Di2015NewLine    DECLARE @RESULT     NVARCHAR(MAX)Di2015NewLine    DECLARE @VCCRLF     VARCHAR(2)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SET @VCCRLF     =   CHAR(13) + CHAR(10)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SELECT @RESULT  =   @REMARKSDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SELECT @RESULT  =   REPLACE(@RESULT,'&','&')Di2015NewLine    SELECT @RESULT  =   REPLACE(@RESULT,'&AMP;','&')Di2015NewLine    SELECT @RESULT  =   REPLACE(@RESULT,'&#','&#')Di2015NewLine    SELECT @RESULT  =   REPLACE(@RESULT,'',' ')Di2015NewLine    SELECT @RESULT  =   REPLACE(@RESULT,'<','<')Di2015NewLine    SELECT @RESULT  =   REPLACE(@RESULT,'>','>')Di2015NewLine    SELECT @RESULT  =   REPLACE(@RESULT,'&QUOT;','"')Di2015NewLine    SELECT @RESULT  =   REPLACE(@RESULT,'&COPY;','©')Di2015NewLine    SELECT @RESULT  =   REPLACE(@RESULT,'&LAQUO;','«')Di2015NewLine    SELECT @RESULT  =   REPLACE(@RESULT,'&RAQUO;','»')Di2015NewLine    SELECT @RESULT  =   REPLACE(@RESULT,'&FRAC14;','¼')Di2015NewLine    SELECT @RESULT  =   REPLACE(@RESULT,'&FRAC12;','½')Di2015NewLine    SELECT @RESULT  =   REPLACE(@RESULT,'&IQUEST;','¿')Di2015NewLine    SELECT @RESULT  =   REPLACE(@RESULT,'<BR />', CHAR(10)) --   LINE FEEDDi2015NewLine    SELECT @RESULT  =   REPLACE(@RESULT,'Di2015NewLine', CHAR(13))  -- CARRIAGE RETURNDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SELECT @RESULT  =   REPLACE(@RESULT,'<P>',@VCCRLF)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    RETURN @RESULTDi2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLine

14212547Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing Android.App;Di2015NewLineusing Android.Content;Di2015NewLineusing Android.Runtime;Di2015NewLineusing Android.Util;Di2015NewLineusing Android.Widget;Di2015NewLineusing Android.Telephony;Di2015NewLineusing Environment = System.Environment;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace MonoDroid.SMSFunDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [BroadcastReceiver(Enabled = true, Label = "SMS Receiver")]Di2015NewLine    [IntentFilter(new[] { "android.provider.Telephony.SMS_RECEIVED" })] Di2015NewLine    public class SMSBroadcastReceiver : BroadcastReceiverDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private const string Tag = "SMSBroadcastReceiver";Di2015NewLine        private const string IntentAction = "android.provider.Telephony.SMS_RECEIVED"; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override void OnReceive(Context context, Intent intent)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Log.Info(Tag, "Intent received: " + intent.Action);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (intent.Action != IntentAction) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var bundle = intent.Extras;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (bundle == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var pdus = bundle.Get("pdus");Di2015NewLine            var castedPdus = JNIEnv.GetArray<Java.Lang.Object>(pdus.Handle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var msgs = new SmsMessage[castedPdus.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < msgs.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var bytes = new byte[JNIEnv.GetArrayLength(castedPdus[i].Handle)];Di2015NewLine                JNIEnv.CopyArray(castedPdus[i].Handle, bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                msgs[i] = SmsMessage.CreateFromPdu(bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                sb.Append(string.Format("SMS From: {0}{1}Body: {2}{1}", msgs[i].OriginatingAddress,Di2015NewLine                                        Environment.NewLine, msgs[i].MessageBody));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Toast.MakeText(context, sb.ToString(), ToastLength.Long).Show();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14215120Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool EvaluateNode( Node node )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var qualificationNode = node as QualificationNode;Di2015NewLine    if ( qualificationNode != null )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return qualificationNode.IsQualificationMet;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    var operatorNode = node as OperatorNode;Di2015NewLine    if ( operatorNode.IsAnd )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return EvaluateNode( node.LeftChild ) && EvaluateNode( node.RightChild );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return EvaluateNode( node.LeftChild ) || EvaluateNode( node.RightChild );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

public static string FormatWith(this string formatDi2015NewLine            , IFormatProvider provider, object source)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (format == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("format");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            List<object> values = new List<object>();Di2015NewLine            string rewrittenFormat = sourceDi2015NewLine                    : Eval(source, propertyGroup.Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  int openings = startGroup.Captures.Count;Di2015NewLine                  int closings = endGroup.Captures.Count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  return openings > closings || openings % 2 == 0Di2015NewLine                     ? m.ValueDi2015NewLine                     : new string('{', openings) + (values.Count - 1)Di2015NewLine                       + formatGroup.ValueDi2015NewLine                       + new string('}', closings);Di2015NewLine              },Di2015NewLine              RegexOptions.CompiledDi2015NewLine              | RegexOptions.CultureInvariantDi2015NewLine              | RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 14223732Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class GeometricExtensions3DDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Vector3D FaceNormal(this MeshGeometry3D geo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // get first triangle's positionsDi2015NewLine        var ptA = geo.Positions[geo.TriangleIndices[0]];Di2015NewLine        var ptB = geo.Positions[geo.TriangleIndices[1]];Di2015NewLine        var ptC = geo.Positions[geo.TriangleIndices[2]];Di2015NewLine        // get specific vectors for right-hand normalizationDi2015NewLine        var vecAB = ptB - ptA;Di2015NewLine        var vecBC = ptC - ptB;Di2015NewLine        // normal is cross productDi2015NewLine        var normal = Vector3D.CrossProduct(vecAB, vecBC);Di2015NewLine        // unit vector for cleanlinessDi2015NewLine        normal.Normalize();Di2015NewLine        return normal;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}   Di2015NewLine
14223732Di2015UniqueSeparatorMeshGeometry3D
14223732Di2015UniqueSeparatorVisual3D
14223732Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static double SSDifference(this Vector3D vectorA, Vector3D vectorB)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // set vectors to length = 1Di2015NewLine        vectorA.Normalize();Di2015NewLine        vectorB.Normalize();Di2015NewLine        // subtract to get difference vectorDi2015NewLine        var diff = Vector3D.Subtract(vectorA, vectorB);Di2015NewLine        // sum of the squares of the difference (also happens to be difference vector squared)Di2015NewLine        return diff.LengthSquared;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
14223732Di2015UniqueSeparatorreturn
14223732Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static bool SharedColumn(this MeshGeometry3D basis, MeshGeometry3D compareTo, Vector3D normal)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (Point3D basePt in basis.Positions)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (Point3D compPt in compareTo.Positions)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var compToBasis = basePt - compPt; // vector from compare point to basis pointDi2015NewLine                if (normal.SSDifference(compToBasis) < float.Epsilon) // at least one will be same direction asDi2015NewLine                {                                                     // as normal if they are shared in a columnDi2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14223732Di2015UniqueSeparator    var cp = GetCubeCenterPoint(); // user-defined method of retrieving cube's center pointDi2015NewLine    // gpu's process matrices in column major order, and they are defined thuslyDi2015NewLine    var matToCenter = new Matrix3D(Di2015NewLine            1, 0, 0, 0,Di2015NewLine            0, 1, 0, 0,Di2015NewLine            0, 0, 0, 1,Di2015NewLine            -cp.X, -cp.Y, -cp.Z, 1);Di2015NewLine    var matBackToPosition = new Matrix3D(Di2015NewLine            1, 0, 0, 0,Di2015NewLine            0, 1, 0, 0,Di2015NewLine            0, 0, 0, 1,Di2015NewLine            cp.X, cp.Y, cp.Z, 1);Di2015NewLine
14223732Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static Point3D CenterPoint(this MeshGeometry3D geo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var midPt = new Point3D(0, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine        var n = geo.Positions.Count;Di2015NewLine        foreach (Point3D pt in geo.Positions)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            midPt.Offset(pt.X, pt.Y, pt.Z);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        midPt.X /= n; midPt.Y /= n; midPt.Z /= n;Di2015NewLine        return midPt;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14230490Di2015UniqueSeparator            // Manage Tree View Nodes in RunTimeDi2015NewLine            // In order to manage a node you should set a key for each nodeDi2015NewLine            // in your case records id's could be fineDi2015NewLine            treeView1.Nodes.Add("RootNode1Key","Root Node1");Di2015NewLine            treeView1.Nodes.Add("RootNode2Key", "Root Node2");Di2015NewLine            // adds a node in runtime with title Root NodeDi2015NewLine            //Now add a Child to "Root Node 2"Di2015NewLine            // first find the node and make a pointer to it :^)Di2015NewLine            TreeNode FoundedNode;Di2015NewLine            FoundedNode = treeView1.Nodes.Find("RootNode2Key", true)[0];Di2015NewLine            // if you create a unique key for each node the find function returnsDi2015NewLine            // a tree node array with only one node and you access it like above Di2015NewLine            // else you retrieve many records of TreeNodeDi2015NewLine            FoundedNode.Nodes.Add("RootNode2Childe1", "Root Node2 Child 1");Di2015NewLine            // hey now you added a child node to RootNode2Di2015NewLine            // you want to add a child for it in depth Di2015NewLine            // 2 ways :Di2015NewLine            // 1: yous find method  treeView1.Nodes.Find("RootNode2Childe1", true)[0];Di2015NewLine            // 2: FollowingDi2015NewLine            FoundedNode.Nodes["RootNode2Childe1"].Nodes.Add("RootNode2Childe1Child1", "my parent is RootNode2Childe1");Di2015NewLine

14237111Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class EmployeeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int ID = 0;Di2015NewLine    public string Name = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine    public string Dept = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine    public string Address = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine    public int Age = 0;Di2015NewLine    public string Email = String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        returnDi2015NewLine            ID.GetHashCode() ^Di2015NewLine            (Name ?? String.Empty).GetHashCode() ^Di2015NewLine            Age.GetHashCode() ^Di2015NewLine            (Email ?? String.Empty).GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine            ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Employee other = obj as Employee;Di2015NewLine        if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return ID == other.ID &&Di2015NewLine                Name == other.Name &&Di2015NewLine                Dept == other.Dept &&Di2015NewLine                Address == other.Address &&Di2015NewLine                Age == other.Age &&Di2015NewLine                Email == other.Email;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14237111Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool CompareLists(List<Employee> list1, List<Employee> list2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (list1 == null || list2 == null)Di2015NewLine        return list1 == list2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (list1.Count != list2.Count)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<Employee, int> hash = new Dictionary<Employee, int>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (Employee employee in list1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (hash.ContainsKey(employee))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            hash[employee]++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            hash.Add(employee, 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Employee employee in list2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!hash.ContainsKey(employee) || hash[employee] == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        hash[employee]--;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14244350Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar input = new[] {"moo", "*", "foo", "bar", "baz", "*", "roo", Di2015NewLine                   "moo", "*", "*", "hoot", "*", "boot"};Di2015NewLine    int index = 0;Di2015NewLine    var output = input.Select( x => newDi2015NewLine                 {Di2015NewLine                   Item=x, Di2015NewLine                   GroupCondition = x =="*" ? ++index:index     // Introduce GroupCondition, Increase it if delimiter is found      Di2015NewLine                 })Di2015NewLine          .GroupBy((x)=>x.GroupCondition)                      // Group by GroupConditionDi2015NewLine          .Select( x => x.Select( y => y.Item));                // Get rid of GroupConditionDi2015NewLine

14248531Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.Mvc;Di2015NewLineusing GetRouteData(HttpContextBase httpContext)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var data = new RouteData();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var url = 14248936Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpressionVisitor
14248936Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MyExpressionVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ParameterExpression TargetParameterExpression { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public object TargetParameterValue { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public MyExpressionVisitor(ParameterExpression targetParameterExpression, object targetParameterValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.TargetParameterExpression = targetParameterExpression;Di2015NewLine        this.TargetParameterValue = targetParameterValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (node == TargetParameterExpression)Di2015NewLine            return Expression.Constant(TargetParameterValue);Di2015NewLine        return base.VisitParameter(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class HelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<B>> BindInput(Expression<Func<A, B>> expression, A input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var parameter = expression.Parameters.Single();Di2015NewLine        var visitor = new MyExpressionVisitor(parameter, input);Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<B>>(visitor.Visit(expression.Body));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14249015Di2015UniqueSeparator[OperationContract]Di2015NewLine[WebInvoke(Method = "POST", UriTemplate="/MyService", RequestFormat = WebMessageFormat.Xml, ResponseFormat = WebMessageFormat.Xml, BodyStyle = WebMessageBodyStyle.Bare)]Di2015NewLine    XElement callRequestFunc(XElement request);Di2015NewLine
14249015Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic XElement callRequestFunc(XElement request)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ServiceProviderTic requestSer = Utility.DeserializeData(request);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (requestSer.Item.GetType() == typeof(RequestType))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            RequestType reqObj = (RequestType)requestSer.Item;Di2015NewLine            string datapiece = reqObj.MsgType.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        XElement responseSer = Utility.SerializeData(requestSer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return responseSer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14249015Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class UtilityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static ServiceProviderTic DeserializeData(XElement request)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ser = new XmlSerializer(typeof(ServiceProviderTic));Di2015NewLine        return (ServiceProviderTic)ser.Deserialize(request.CreateReader());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static XElement SerializeData(ServiceProviderTic response)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var memoryStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (TextWriter streamWriter = new StreamWriter(memoryStream))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var xmlSerializer = new XmlSerializer(typeof(ServiceProviderTic));Di2015NewLine                xmlSerializer.Serialize(streamWriter, response);Di2015NewLine                return Utility.RemoveAllNamespaces(XElement.Parse(Encoding.ASCII.GetString(memoryStream.ToArray())));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static XElement RemoveAllNamespaces(XElement source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return !source.HasElementsDi2015NewLine                   ? new XElement(source.Name.LocalName)Di2015NewLine                   {Di2015NewLine                       Value = source.ValueDi2015NewLine                   }Di2015NewLine                   : new XElement(source.Name.LocalName, source.Elements().Select(el => RemoveAllNamespaces(el)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14249693Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Double FuturesOptionPriceCallAmericanBinomial(Double spotPrice, Double optionStrike, Double r, Double sigma, Double time, Double steps)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Avoid calling Convert multiple times as it can be quite performance expensive.Di2015NewLine    Int32 stepsInteger = Convert.ToInt32(steps);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Double[] futurePrices = new Double[(stepsInteger + 1)];Di2015NewLine    Double[] callValues = new Double[(stepsInteger + 1)];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Double tDelta = time / steps;Di2015NewLine    Double rInv = Math.Exp(-r * (tDelta));Di2015NewLine    Double u = Math.Exp(sigma * Math.Sqrt(tDelta));Di2015NewLine    Double d = 1.0 / u;Di2015NewLine    Double uu = u * u;Di2015NewLine    Double pUp = (1 - d) / (u - d);Di2015NewLine    Double pDown = 1.0 - pUp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    futurePrices[0] = spotPrice * Math.Pow(d, steps);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (Int32 i = 1; i <= steps; ++i)Di2015NewLine        futurePrices[i] = uu * futurePrices[(i - 1)];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (Int32 i = 0; i <= steps; ++i)Di2015NewLine        callValues[i] = Math.Max(0.0, (futurePrices[i] - optionStrike));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (Int32 step = stepsInteger - 1; step >= 0; --step)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (Int32 i = 0; i <= step; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            futurePrices[i] = d * futurePrices[(i + 1)];Di2015NewLine            callValues[i] = ((pDown * callValues[i]) + (pUp * callValues[i + 1])) * rInv;Di2015NewLine            callValues[i] = Math.Max(callValues[i], (futurePrices[i] - option_strike));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return callValues[0];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

       public IEnumerable<ILInstruction> InstructionsDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte[] instructionBytes = this.intermediateLanguageProvider.GetMethodBody();Di2015NewLine                int instructionIndex = 0, startAddress;Di2015NewLine                for (int position = 0; position < (short)((operationData << 8) | instructionBytes[++position]);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    position++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine (code.OperandType == OperandType.InlineSwitch)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        dataSize = (int)objData;Di2015NewLine                        int[] labels = new      instructionIndex++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Creates the    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Checks to see if the IL instruction is a prefix indicating the length of the instruction is two bytes long.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="value">The IL instruction as a byte.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <remarks>IL instructions can either be 1 or 2 bytes.</remarks>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>True if this IL instruction is a prefix indicating the instruction is two bytes long.</returns>Di2015NewLine        private static bool IsInstructionPrefix(short value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ((value & OpCodes.Prefix1.Value) == OpCodes.Prefix1.Value) || ((value & OpCodes.Prefix2.Value) == OpCodes.Prefix2.Value)Di2015NewLine                        || ((value & OpCodes.Prefix3.Value) == OpCodes.Prefix3.Value) || ((value & OpCodes.Prefix4.Value) == OpCodes.Prefix4.Value)Di2015NewLine                        || ((value & OpCodes.Prefix5.Value) == OpCodes.Prefix5.Value) || ((value & OpCodes.Prefix6.Value) == OpCodes.Prefix6.Value)Di2015NewLine                        || ((value & OpCodes.Prefix7.Value) == OpCodes.Prefix7.Value) || ((value & OpCodes.Prefixref.Value) == OpCodes.Prefixref.Value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The get lookup table.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        ///         return 8;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    return 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private object
