  break;Di2015NewLine                case OperandType.InlineMethod:Di2015NewLine                    data = this.intermediateLanguageProvider.ResolveMethod(BitConverter.ToInt32(rawData, 0));Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case OperandType.InlineR:Di2015NewLine                    data = BitConverter.ToDouble(rawData, 0);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case OperandType.InlineSig:Di2015NewLine                    data = this.intermediateLanguageProvider.ResolveSignature(BitConverter.ToInt32(rawData, 0));Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case OperandType.InlineString:Di2015NewLine                    data =      case OperandType.InlineType:Di2015NewLine                    data = this.intermediateLanguageProvider.ResolveType(BitConverter.ToInt32(rawData, 0));Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return data;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal class 14252808Di2015UniqueSeparatoraction
14252808Di2015UniqueSeparator~x
14252808Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing size_t = System.UInt32;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class LRParserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private string[] symbols;  // index => symbolDi2015NewLine    private IDictionary<string, size_t> interned = new SortedDictionary<string, size_t>();  // symbol => indexDi2015NewLine    private int[/*state*/, /*lookahead*/] actions;  // If >= 0, represents new state after shift. If < 0, represents one's complement (i.e. ~x) of reduction rule.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public LRParser(params KeyValuePair<string, string[]>[] grammar)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.interned.Add(string.Empty, new size_t());Di2015NewLine        foreach (var rule in grammar)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!this.interned.ContainsKey(rule.Key))Di2015NewLine            { this.interned.Add(rule.Key, (size_t)this.interned.Count); }Di2015NewLine            foreach (var symbol in rule.Value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!this.interned.ContainsKey(symbol))Di2015NewLine                { this.interned.Add(symbol, (size_t)this.interned.Count); }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.symbols = this.interned.ToArray().OrderBy(p => p.Value).Select(p => p.Key).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        var syntax = Array.ConvertAll(grammar, r => new KeyValuePair<size_t, size_t[]>(this.interned[r.Key], Array.ConvertAll(r.Value, s => this.interned[s])));Di2015NewLine        var nonterminals = Array.ConvertAll(this.symbols, s => new List<size_t>());Di2015NewLine        for (size_t i = 0; i < syntax.Length; i++) { nonterminals[syntax[i].Key].Add(i); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var firsts = Array.ConvertAll(Enumerable.Range(0, this.symbols.Length).ToArray(), s => nonterminals[s].Count > 0 ? new HashSet<size_t>() : new HashSet<size_t>() { (size_t)s });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int old;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            old = firsts.Select(l => l.Count).Sum();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var rule in syntax)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (var i in First(rule.Value, firsts))Di2015NewLine                { firsts[rule.Key].Add(i); }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } while (old < firsts.Select(l => l.Count).Sum());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var actions = new Dictionary<int, IDictionary<size_t, IList<int>>>();Di2015NewLine        var states = new Dictionary<HashSet<Item>, int>(HashSet<Item>.CreateSetComparer());Di2015NewLine        var todo = new Stack<HashSet<Item>>();Di2015NewLine        var root = new Item(0, 0, new size_t());Di2015NewLine        todo.Push(new HashSet<Item>());Di2015NewLine        Closure(root, todo.Peek(), firsts, syntax, nonterminals);Di2015NewLine        states.Add(new HashSet<Item>(todo.Peek()), states.Count);Di2015NewLine        while (todo.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var set = todo.Pop();Di2015NewLine            var closure = new HashSet<Item>();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in set)Di2015NewLine            { Closure(item, closure, firsts, syntax, nonterminals); }Di2015NewLine            var grouped = Array.ConvertAll(this.symbols, _ => new HashSet<Item>());Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in closure)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (item.Symbol >= syntax[item.Rule].Value.Length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    IDictionary<size_t, IList<int>> map;Di2015NewLine                    if (!actions.TryGetValue(states[set], out map))Di2015NewLine                    { actions[states[set]] = map = new Dictionary<size_t, IList<int>>(); }Di2015NewLine                    IList<int> list;Di2015NewLine                    if (!map.TryGetValue(item.Lookahead, out list))Di2015NewLine                    { map[item.Lookahead] = list = new List<int>(); }Di2015NewLine                    list.Add(~(int)item.Rule);Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                var next = item;Di2015NewLine                next.Symbol++;Di2015NewLine                grouped[syntax[item.Rule].Value[item.Symbol]].Add(next);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            for (size_t symbol = 0; symbol < grouped.Length; symbol++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var g = new HashSet<Item>();Di2015NewLine                foreach (var item in grouped[symbol])Di2015NewLine                { Closure(item, g, firsts, syntax, nonterminals); }Di2015NewLine                if (g.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int state;Di2015NewLine                    if (!states.TryGetValue(g, out state))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        state = states.Count;Di2015NewLine                        states.Add(g, state);Di2015NewLine                        todo.Push(g);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    IDictionary<size_t, IList<int>> map;Di2015NewLine                    if (!actions.TryGetValue(states[set], out map))Di2015NewLine                    { actions[states[set]] = map = new Dictionary<size_t, IList<int>>(); }Di2015NewLine                    IList<int> list;Di2015NewLine                    if (!map.TryGetValue(symbol, out list))Di2015NewLine                    { map[symbol] = list = new List<int>(); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    list.Add(state);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.actions = new int[states.Count, this.symbols.Length];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < this.actions.GetLength(0); i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < this.actions.GetLength(1); j++)Di2015NewLine            { this.actions[i, j] = int.MinValue; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (var p in actions)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var q in p.Value)Di2015NewLine            { this.actions[p.Key, q.Key] = q.Value.Single(); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var state in states.OrderBy(p => p.Value))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("State {0}:", state.Value);Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in state.Key.OrderBy(i => i.Rule).ThenBy(i => i.Symbol).ThenBy(i => i.Lookahead))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine                    "\\t{0}: {1} \\xB7 {2} | {3} →  {0}",Di2015NewLine                    this.symbols[syntax[item.Rule].Key],Di2015NewLine                    string.Join(" ", syntax[item.Rule].Value.Take((int)item.Symbol).Select(s => this.symbols[s]).ToArray()),Di2015NewLine                    string.Join(" ", syntax[item.Rule].Value.Skip((int)item.Symbol).Select(s => this.symbols[s]).ToArray()),Di2015NewLine                    this.symbols[item.Lookahead] == string.Empty ? "\\x04" : this.symbols[item.Lookahead],Di2015NewLine                    string.Join(Di2015NewLine                        ", ",Di2015NewLine                        Array.ConvertAll(Di2015NewLine                            actions[state.Value][item.Symbol < syntax[item.Rule].Value.Length ? syntax[item.Rule].Value[item.Symbol] : item.Lookahead].ToArray(),Di2015NewLine                            a => a >= 0 ? string.Format("state {0}", a) : string.Format("{0} (rule {1})", this.symbols[syntax[~a].Key], ~a))));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Closure(Item item, HashSet<Item> closure /*output*/, HashSet<size_t>[] firsts, KeyValuePair<size_t, size_t[]>[] syntax, IList<size_t>[] nonterminals)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (closure.Add(item) && item.Symbol >= syntax[item.Rule].Value.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var r in nonterminals[syntax[item.Rule].Value[item.Symbol]])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (var i in First(syntax[item.Rule].Value.Skip((int)(item.Symbol + 1)), firsts))Di2015NewLine                { Closure(new Item(r, 0, i == new size_t() ? item.Lookahead : i), closure, firsts, syntax, nonterminals); }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private struct Item : IEquatable<Item>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public size_t Rule;Di2015NewLine        public size_t Symbol;Di2015NewLine        public size_t Lookahead;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Item(size_t rule, size_t symbol, size_t lookahead)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Rule = rule;Di2015NewLine            this.Symbol = symbol;Di2015NewLine            this.Lookahead = lookahead;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override bool Equals(object obj) { return obj is Item && this.Equals((Item)obj); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Equals(Item other)Di2015NewLine        { return this.Rule == other.Rule && this.Symbol == other.Symbol && this.Lookahead == other.Lookahead; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine        { return this.Rule.GetHashCode() ^ this.Symbol.GetHashCode() ^ this.Lookahead.GetHashCode(); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<size_t> First(IEnumerable<size_t> symbols, IEnumerable<size_t>[] map)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var symbol in symbols)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool epsilon = false;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var s in map[symbol])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (s == new size_t()) { epsilon = true; }Di2015NewLine                else { yield return s; }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (!epsilon) { yield break; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield return new size_t();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static KeyValuePair<K, V> MakePair<K, V>(K k, V v) { return new KeyValuePair<K, V>(k, v); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        var parser = new LRParser(Di2015NewLine            MakePair("start", new string[] { "exps" }),Di2015NewLine            MakePair("exps", new string[] { "exps", "exp" }),Di2015NewLine            MakePair("exps", new string[] { }),Di2015NewLine            MakePair("exp", new string[] { "INTEGER" })Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14254249Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<TResult> ZipIt<TSource, TResult>(IEnumerable<IEnumerable<TSource>> collection, Di2015NewLine                                            Func<IEnumerable<TSource>, TResult> resultSelector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var enumerators = collection.Select(c => c.GetEnumerator()).ToList();Di2015NewLine    while (enumerators.All(e => e.MoveNext()))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return resultSelector(enumerators.Select(e => (TSource)e.Current).ToList());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14254298Di2015UniqueSeparator    #region comPort_ErrorReceivedDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// This method will be called when there's data waiting in the bufferDi2015NewLine    ///  and error occured.Di2015NewLine    /// DisplayData is a custom method used for loggingDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sender"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e"></param>Di2015NewLine    void comPort_ErrorReceived(object sender, SerialErrorReceivedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SerialError sr = e.EventType;Di2015NewLine        switch (sr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case SerialError.Frame:Di2015NewLine                DisplayData(newLog, EventLogEntryType.Error, "On port " + comPort.PortNameDi2015NewLine                    + " the hardware detected a framing error.\\n", 45);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case SerialError.Overrun:Di2015NewLine                DisplayData(newLog, EventLogEntryType.Error, "On port " + comPort.PortNameDi2015NewLine                    + " a character-buffer overrun has occurred. The next character is lost.\\n", 46);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case SerialError.RXOver:Di2015NewLine                DisplayData(newLog, EventLogEntryType.Error, "On port " + comPort.PortNameDi2015NewLine                    + " an input buffer overflow has occured. There is either no room in the input buffer,"Di2015NewLine                    + " or a character was received after the End-Of-File (EOF) character.\\n", 47);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case SerialError.RXParity:Di2015NewLine                DisplayData(newLog, EventLogEntryType.Error, "On port " + comPort.PortNameDi2015NewLine                    + " the hardware detected a parity error.\\n", 48);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case SerialError.TXFull:Di2015NewLine                DisplayData(newLog, EventLogEntryType.Error, "On port " + comPort.PortNameDi2015NewLine                    + " the application tried to transmit a character, but the output buffer was full.\\n", 49);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                DisplayData(newLog, EventLogEntryType.Error, "On port " + comPort.PortNameDi2015NewLine                    + " an unknown error occurred.\\n", 50);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
14254298Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void port_DataReceived(object sender, SerialDataReceivedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineint btr = comPort.BytesToRead;Di2015NewLinebyte[] comBuffer = new byte[btr];Di2015NewLinecomPort.Read(comBuffer, 0, btr);Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(ByteToHex(comBuffer));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate string ByteToHex(byte[] comByte)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder(comByte.Length * 3);Di2015NewLine            foreach (byte data in comByte)Di2015NewLine                builder.Append(Convert.ToString(data, 16).PadLeft(2, '0').PadRight(3, ' '));Di2015NewLine            return builder.ToString().ToUpper();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

14257519Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T Str2Val<T>(string str)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!typeof(T).IsArray)Di2015NewLine        return (T)Convert.ChangeType(str, typeof(T));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Type elementType = typeof(T).GetElementType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string[] entries = str.Split(',');Di2015NewLine    int numberOfEntries = entries.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    System.Array array = Array.CreateInstance(elementType, numberOfEntries);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfEntries; i++)Di2015NewLine        array.SetValue(Convert.ChangeType(entries[i], elementType), i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (T)(object)array;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14261878Di2015UniqueSeparatorlet minimum_iterations = 1Di2015NewLinelet minimum_pattern_length = 2Di2015NewLinelet src = source stringDi2015NewLinelet suffix = sorted suffix array, Di2015NewLine             where each entry is suffix i0 (inclusive) to |src| (exclusive)Di2015NewLinelet lcp = longest common prefixes, Di2015NewLine             where lcp(i) = longest common prefix of suffix(i) and suffix(i-1) when i > 0,Di2015NewLine             or 0 if i = 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor i = 0 to |suffix|:Di2015NewLine    if lcp[i] < minimum_pattern_length: continue        Di2015NewLine    let j = iDi2015NewLine    let iterations = 0Di2015NewLine    let last_matched_i0 = suffix[i-1].i0Di2015NewLine    while j < |suffix| and lcp[j] >= lcp[i]:Di2015NewLine        if (suffix[j].i0 + lcp[i] + 1) = last_matched_i0: Di2015NewLine            iterations++Di2015NewLine            last_matched_i0 = suffix[j].i0Di2015NewLine        j++Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    print 'pattern = ' .. suffix[i][0..lcp[i]] .. ' iterations = ' .. iterationsDi2015NewLine    print 'starting at ' .. suffix[j-1].i0 .. ' to ' .. suffix[i-1].i0 + lcp[i]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    skip pattern if wantedDi2015NewLine
14261878Di2015UniqueSeparator(suffix[j].i0 + lcp[i] + 1) = last_matched_i0
14261878Di2015UniqueSeparatorsuffix[j]
14261878Di2015UniqueSeparatorsuffix[j-1]

14267890Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Expression<Func<T,bool>> BuildPredicate<T>(string member, object value) {Di2015NewLine    var p = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    Expression body = p;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var subMember in member.Split('.')) {Di2015NewLine        body = Expression.PropertyOrField(body, subMember);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(Expression.Equal(Di2015NewLine        body, Expression.Constant(value, body.Type)), p);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14267922Di2015UniqueSeparator[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Class | AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple = false, Inherited = true)]Di2015NewLinepublic class OptimizationsDebuggingAttribute : ActionFilterAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const String PARAM_NAME = "DisableOptimizations";Di2015NewLine    private const String COOKIE_NAME = "MySite.DisableOptimizations";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void OnActionExecuting(ActionExecutingContext filterContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Boolean parsedPref;Di2015NewLine        Boolean optimizationsDisabled = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (filterContext.HttpContext.Request.QueryString[PARAM_NAME] != null)Di2015NewLine        { // incoming change requestDi2015NewLine            var pref = filterContext.HttpContext.Request.QueryString[PARAM_NAME].ToString();Di2015NewLine            if (Boolean.TryParse(pref, out parsedPref))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                optimizationsDisabled = parsedPref;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        { // use existing settingsDi2015NewLine            var cookie = filterContext.HttpContext.Request.Cookies[COOKIE_NAME];Di2015NewLine            if (cookie != null && Boolean.TryParse(cookie.Value, out parsedPref))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                optimizationsDisabled = parsedPref;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // make the changeDi2015NewLine        System.Web.Optimization.BundleTable.EnableOptimizations = !optimizationsDisabled;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // save for future requestsDi2015NewLine        HttpCookie savedPref = new HttpCookie(COOKIE_NAME, optimizationsDisabled.ToString())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Expires = DateTime.Now.AddDays(1)Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        filterContext.HttpContext.Response.SetCookie(savedPref);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        base.OnActionExecuting(filterContext);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14269624Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Numerics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class PhaseListDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private Dictionary<int, Complex> mPhases = new Dictionary<int, Complex>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Complex this[int pIndex]Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Complex lRet;Di2015NewLine                mPhases.TryGetValue(pIndex, out lRet);Di2015NewLine                return lRet;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                mPhases.Remove(pIndex);Di2015NewLine                mPhases.Add(pIndex, value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class PhasedTypeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private PhaseList mPhases = new PhaseList();Di2015NewLine        public PhaseList Phases { get { return mPhases; } }Di2015NewLine        public static implicit operator Complex(PhasedType pSelf)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return pSelf.Phases[1];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static implicit operator PhasedType(Complex pValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PhasedType lRet = new PhasedType();Di2015NewLine            lRet.Phases[1] = pValue;Di2015NewLine            return lRet;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class BusDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public PhasedType Voltage { get; 14276391Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MimeTypesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static List<string> knownTypes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<string, string> mimeTypes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool IsWord(string fileName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (knownTypes == null || mimeTypes == null)Di2015NewLine            InitializeMimeTypeLists();Di2015NewLine        string contentType = "";Di2015NewLine        string extension = Path.GetExtension(fileName).Remove(0, 1).ToLower();Di2015NewLine        mimeTypes.TryGetValue(extension, out contentType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (contentType == "application/msword" &&Di2015NewLine            ScanFileForMimeType(fileName) == "application/x-zip-compressed")Di2015NewLine            // if you  want to include ".doc" files, Di2015NewLine            // add "application/octet-stream" as wellDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("urlmon.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Auto)]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static extern UInt32 FindMimeFromData(Di2015NewLine       UInt32 pBC, [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPStr)]Di2015NewLine       string pwzUrl, [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPArray)]Di2015NewLine       byte[] pBuffer, UInt32 cbSize, [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPStr)]Di2015NewLine       string pwzMimeProposed, UInt32 dwMimeFlags, ref UInt32 ppwzMimeOut, UInt32 dwReserverdDi2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string ScanFileForMimeType(string fileName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = new byte[256];Di2015NewLine            using (FileStream fs = new FileStream(fileName, FileMode.Open))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int readLength = Convert.ToInt32(Math.Min(256, fs.Length));Di2015NewLine                fs.Read(buffer, 0, readLength);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            UInt32 mimeType = default(UInt32);Di2015NewLine            FindMimeFromData(0, null, buffer, 256, null, 0, ref mimeType, 0);Di2015NewLine            IntPtr mimeTypePtr = new IntPtr(mimeType);Di2015NewLine            string mime = Marshal.PtrToStringUni(mimeTypePtr);Di2015NewLine            Marshal.FreeCoTaskMem(mimeTypePtr);Di2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(mime))Di2015NewLine                mime = "application/octet-stream";Di2015NewLine            return mime;Di2015NewLine        } catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "application/octet-stream";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void InitializeMimeTypeLists()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        knownTypes = new List<string>() {Di2015NewLine            "text/plain",Di2015NewLine            "text/html",Di2015NewLine            "text/xml",Di2015NewLine            "text/richtext",Di2015NewLine            "text/scriptlet",Di2015NewLine            "audio/x-aiff",Di2015NewLine            "audio/basic",Di2015NewLine            "audio/mid",Di2015NewLine            "audio/wav",Di2015NewLine            "image/gif",Di2015NewLine            "image/jpeg",Di2015NewLine            "image/pjpeg",Di2015NewLine            "image/png",Di2015NewLine            "image/x-png",Di2015NewLine            "image/tiff",Di2015NewLine            "image/bmp",Di2015NewLine            "image/x-xbitmap",Di2015NewLine            "image/x-jg",Di2015NewLine            "image/x-emf",Di2015NewLine            "image/x-wmf",Di2015NewLine            "video/avi",Di2015NewLine            "video/mpeg",Di2015NewLine            "application/octet-stream",Di2015NewLine            "application/postscript",Di2015NewLine            "application/base64",Di2015NewLine            "application/macbinhex40",Di2015NewLine            "application/pdf",Di2015NewLine            "application/xml",Di2015NewLine            "application/atom+xml",Di2015NewLine            "application/rss+xml",Di2015NewLine            "application/x-compressed",Di2015NewLine            "application/x-zip-compressed",Di2015NewLine            "application/x-gzip-compressed",Di2015NewLine            "application/java",Di2015NewLine            "application/x-msdownload"Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        mimeTypes = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine        mimeTypes.Add("3dm", "x-world/x-3dmf");Di2015NewLine        mimeTypes.Add("3dmf", "x-world/x-3dmf");Di2015NewLine        mimeTypes.Add("a", "application/octet-stream");Di2015NewLine        mimeTypes.Add("aab", "application/x-authorware-bin");Di2015NewLine        mimeTypes.Add("aam", "application/x-authorware-map");Di2015NewLine        mimeTypes.Add("aas", "application/x-authorware-seg");Di2015NewLine        mimeTypes.Add("abc", "text/vnd.abc");Di2015NewLine
